programme.desc: Kolekcija videobiografija najvećih holivudskih zvijezda. Emisija "Close Up" gledateljima pred malim ekranima donosi intervjue s najvećim hollywoodskim zvijezdama, ali i zanimljivosti vezane uz svijet filma. Uživajte uz zabavne i zanimljive minute ove biografske emisije!

programme.title: Yankee Zulu
Yankee Zulu
programme.desc: Yankee Zulu: Directed by Gray Hofmeyr. With Leon Schuster, John Matshikiza, Wilson Dunster, Terri Treas. As children, Rhino and Zulu were best friends, until an incident causes them to go their separate ways. They meet up again as adults when Zulu, who has spent years in the United States, has become a wanted criminal. And when the German dude lights his cigarette, the tub explodes and he goes soaring through the sky. And the other was when the domestic servant wanted to make love to Schuster and when he took off, the servant said: "AWU!" which means " Oh dear!" Goodness gracious me! programme.title: Rent-a-Kid
Rent-a-Kid
programme.desc: Rent-a-Kid: Directed by Fred Gerber. With Leslie Nielsen, Christopher Lloyd, Matt McCoy, Sherry Miller. Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114268/","name":"Rent-a-Kid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYwMzA3Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTI1NDMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114268/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"inkblot11"},"dateCreated":"2006-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darling family film...if only real life could be like this! Anything is possible, no?","reviewBody":"Russ and Valerie are having discussions about starting a family. The couple live in a posh apartment and run an auction business that deals with valuable collectibles. At the same time, a dedicated adoption agency owner takes a mini vacation and leaves the orphanage in the charge of his father (Leslie Nielsen). Father Harry is in the rental business and he gets the brilliant idea to "rent" some of the children of the orphanage to couples like Russ and Valerie. Harry, who becomes aware of the couple'e dilemma, offers a family of siblings for a 10 day rental period! Brandon, Kyle, and Molly move into the apartment with their temporary parents, with amusing consequences, as the new caretakers are inexperienced with kids. But, where is the possibility of a happy ending? This is a darling family film. The actors, including Nielsen as the wheeler-dealer and Christopher Lloyd as the kind apartment doorman, are all wonderful. The script is snappy and fun and the overall production values quite high. Yes, if only life could be this way! Orphaned children everywhere deserve a chance to prove that they are lovable and can give so much joy to the parents who are considering adoption. If you want to show a film to your family that is rooted in good values but is also highly entertaining, find this movie. It is guaranteed to have everyone laughing, even as their hearts are melting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1969,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Drama","Family","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1995-11-04","keywords":"nightmare,boy,girl,dog,pet dog","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000558/","name":"Leslie Nielsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000502/","name":"Christopher Lloyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566783/","name":"Matt McCoy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314104/","name":"Fred Gerber"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011877/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044583/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0076602/","name":"Paul Bernbaum"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

At the same time, a dedicated adoption agency owner takes a mini vacation and leaves the orphanage in the charge of his father (Leslie Nielsen). Harry, who becomes aware of the couple'e dilemma, offers a family of siblings for a 10 day rental period! Yes, if only life could be this way! Orphaned children everywhere deserve a chance to prove that they are lovable and can give so much joy to the parents who are considering adoption. programme.title: Evolution
Evolucija
programme.desc:
Evolution: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With David Duchovny, Julianne Moore, Orlando Jones, Seann William Scott. A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0251075/","name":"Evolution","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTU3YjhjZmItNzBjNi00YWVjLWE0ZGQtNGY1NTFmMDczMzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A fire-fighting cadet, two college professors, and a geeky but sexy government scientist work against an alien organism that has been rapidly evolving since its arrival on Earth inside a meteor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0251075/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FiendishDramaturgy"},"dateCreated":"2007-05-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is Under-rated!","reviewBody":"While this film is far from a masterpiece, Evolution deserves better ratings than it currently enjoys here at IMDb. The cast and crew contribute superior work, and the storyline is quite inventive. The premise has been done a few times before, however, it has never been done quite as well as the treatment it receives here.

Alien spores land here on Earth and begin to wreak havoc.

I found this highly entertaining, cleverly witty, with a slick production quality which tends to draw in the audience, who finds its members laughing, sometimes in spite of themselves. You won't WANT to like this. There is a large amount of juvenile humor, which usually would detract from a work such as this, but this is a sci-fi comedy that WORKS.

Again, it's no masterpiece, but it IS clever and fun, in spite of the sophomoric humor.

It rates a 7.3/10 from...

programme.title: The Grudge
Kletva
programme.desc:
The Grudge: Directed by Takashi Shimizu. With Sarah Michelle Gellar, Jason Behr, William Mapother, Clea DuVall. An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror. It's a great watch","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":142390,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"elderly,housewife,pet cat,bus,male frontal nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Grudge","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi761242649","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI2MDE0ZjItZTA4ZC00M2I5LWIyNTktMjhiM2VkOWMxNDNmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Grudge"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001264/","name":"Sarah Michelle Gellar"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004736/","name":"Jason Behr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0245112/","name":"Clea DuVall"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167921/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839812/","name":"Stephen Susco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1234345/","name":"Takashi Shimizu"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0391198/","name":"The Grudge","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIxODg1Nzc3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjM0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An American nurse living and working in Tokyo is exposed to a mysterious supernatural curse, one that locks a person in a powerful rage before claiming their life and spreading to another victim.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0391198/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"olivewahh","dateCreated":"2020-02-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's still good after so many years","reviewBody":"With the new release of The Grudge, I went back and rewatched this original to see if it was as good as I had remembered.

Karen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) lives in Japan and works as a caretaker for the elderly people. Getting assigned a job, Karen visits the elder lady and begins to discover some unusual and mysterious behaviour coming from the house. After leaving the house, things become haunting for Karen with everywhere she goes and discovers a dark history of the house.

Honestly, for a film that came out in 2004, it's pretty good. I mean watching it now, the graphics aren't amazing, but again the film is 16 years old. I remember when the film came out that a lot of people said the original Japanese version was terrifying, but I still think this one is scary.

SMG was such an A Lister when this came out, after staring in Buffy and many other iconic movies, everyone knew who she was. She's not bad in the film, except when she runs like she's still in Buffy lol

Still would recommend this film to fans of horror. programme.title: Saw V
Slagalica strave 5
programme.desc: Saw V: Directed by David Hackl. With Tobin Bell, Costas Mandylor, Scott Patterson, Betsy Russell. Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1132626/","name":"Saw V","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2ZWQ4YTYtZDY0Zi00YzkxLTgxNTMtMTE3MDE3NzQyNjc2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjE5MjUyOTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following Jigsaw's grisly demise, Mark Hoffman is commended as a hero, but Agent Strahm is suspicious, and delves into Hoffman's past. Meanwhile, another group of people are put through a series of gruesome tests.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1132626/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"EJasonNYM"},"dateCreated":"2008-10-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not as good as previous installments","reviewBody":"While this is still a watchable, well acted movie that continues on the Saw tradition well I have to give it a lower rating because it just was not as good as the previous installments. The plot and the traps that we have come to be surprised by seemed to be a more predictable and rushed along by the makers of the movie. It seemed like this movie could have just been tossed in with part 4 to make one big movie as the prequel to the next part. So to me it seemed like the studio just split up 1 movie into 2 parts to capitalize on the profits....which they have done well I might add because myself and many other movie goers packed the theater for the 5th Saw installment. So in closing I think this movie may be adequate for the die hard saw fans, not nearly good enough for new comers, and winds up lacking far more than it gives. That is why I can only give this movie a 5 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":121163,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"tied to a table,self surgery,jigsaw character,amanda young character,repeat sequel","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Saw V: Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi627179545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMTY3MTMxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc3MzczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the theatrical trailer for Saw V, directed by David Hackl."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0666398/","name":"Scott Patterson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0541908/","name":"Costas Mandylor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068551/","name":"Tobin Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0352524/","name":"David Hackl"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0137447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142446/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184201/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733317/","name":"Patrick Melton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1729303/","name":"Marcus Dunstan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jason X
Jason X
programme.desc:
Jason X: Directed by James Isaac. With Kane Hodder, Jeff Geddis, Lexa Doig, David Cronenberg. Jason Voorhees is cryogenically frozen at the beginning of the 21st century, and is discovered in the 25th century and taken to space. He gets thawed, and begins stalking and killing the crew of the spaceship that's transporting him." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0211443/","name":"Jason X","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzc0MDllYjktYzFjZi00OTgwLWJmZWMtODlmMTVlODQyZTgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Jason Voorhees is cryogenically frozen at the beginning of the 21st century, and is discovered in the 25th century and taken to space. He gets thawed, and begins stalking and killing the crew of the spaceship that's transporting him.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0211443/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ivo-cobra8"},"dateCreated":"2017-09-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"I admit a guilty pleasure of mine I never thought this is a terrible film","reviewBody":"SPOILER: Uber Jason in outer space I don't mind the film and it is a guilty pleasure of mine. I saw this movie in the video store 11 years ago when I was in high school I saw the VHS cover of the film and I saw it on DVD. So finally I got this film on Blu-ray disc just finish it watching it today and I must say it is not a bad film I like it a lot. Like I said it is a guilty pleasure of mine. I know a lot of people hate this film I don't. I think is MILES way better then Jason Goes to Hell and Miles way better movie then Hellraiser: Bloodline that was in outer space this movie is just better.

7.years ago when I become a fan of Supernatural I heard that Jared Padalecki will be in the reboot Friday the 13th movie I rushed to see this movie. I watch Friday the 13th the original, Friday the 13th Part 2, the (2009) reboot and this film Jason X and yes I like it.

programme.title: Interior
Teror
programme.desc: Interior: Directed by Marek Lechki. With Magdalena Poplawska, Piotr Zurawski, Tomasz Sapryk, Lech Mackiewicz. Maciek (35), tricked by his boss, steals his boss's car and goes on a desperate joyride across. He drives across the interior of Poland, where people are preparing for a celebration of an unspecified anniversary. In the meanwhile, Magda (35), a Town Hall employee in charge of the anniversary events, Highly committed at first, gradually notices all the dirt and corruption around her. At some point, she must choose between her career and integrity, whether she should accept it or risk her career and leave. Finally, on the celebration day, Maciek and Magda finally meet. programme.title: Rent-a-Kid
Rent-a-Kid
programme.desc: Rent-a-Kid: Directed by Fred Gerber. With Leslie Nielsen, Christopher Lloyd, Matt McCoy, Sherry Miller. Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114268/","name":"Rent-a-Kid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYwMzA3Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTI1NDMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114268/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"inkblot11"},"dateCreated":"2006-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darling family film...if only real life could be like this! Anything is possible, no?","reviewBody":"Russ and Valerie are having discussions about starting a family. The couple live in a posh apartment and run an auction business that deals with valuable collectibles. At the same time, a dedicated adoption agency owner takes a mini vacation and leaves the orphanage in the charge of his father (Leslie Nielsen). Father Harry is in the rental business and he gets the brilliant idea to "rent" some of the children of the orphanage to couples like Russ and Valerie. Harry, who becomes aware of the couple'e dilemma, offers a family of siblings for a 10 day rental period! Brandon, Kyle, and Molly move into the apartment with their temporary parents, with amusing consequences, as the new caretakers are inexperienced with kids. But, where is the possibility of a happy ending? This is a darling family film. The actors, including Nielsen as the wheeler-dealer and Christopher Lloyd as the kind apartment doorman, are all wonderful. The script is snappy and fun and the overall production values quite high. Yes, if only life could be this way! Orphaned children everywhere deserve a chance to prove that they are lovable and can give so much joy to the parents who are considering adoption. If you want to show a film to your family that is rooted in good values but is also highly entertaining, find this movie. It is guaranteed to have everyone laughing, even as their hearts are melting.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1969,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Drama","Family","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1995-11-04","keywords":"nightmare,boy,girl,dog,pet dog","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000558/","name":"Leslie Nielsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000502/","name":"Christopher Lloyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566783/","name":"Matt McCoy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314104/","name":"Fred Gerber"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011877/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044583/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0076602/","name":"Paul Bernbaum"}],"duration":"PT1H25M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0114268, Title: Rent-a-Kid, --- Description: Rent-a-Kid: Directed by Fred Gerber. With Leslie Nielsen, Christopher Lloyd, Matt McCoy, Sherry Miller. Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0114268/","name":"Rent-a-Kid","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjYwMzA3Njg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTI1NDMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Harry Habert, owner of a rent office has an original idea: To rent babies from a nearby orphanage to the local families. He rents the Ward brothers to his first customers.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0114268/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"inkblot11","dateCreated":"2006-11-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Darling family film...if only real life could be like this! Anything is possible, no?","reviewBody":"Russ and Valerie are having discussions about starting a family. The couple live in a posh apartment and run an auction business that deals with valuable collectibles. At the same time, a dedicated adoption agency owner takes a mini vacation and leaves the orphanage in the charge of his father (Leslie Nielsen). Father Harry is in the rental business and he gets the brilliant idea to "rent" some of the children of the orphanage to couples like Russ and Valerie. Harry, who becomes aware of the couple'e dilemma, offers a family of siblings for a 10 day rental period! Brandon, Kyle, and Molly move into the apartment with their temporary parents, with amusing consequences, as the new caretakers are inexperienced with kids. But, where is the possibility of a happy ending? This is a darling family film. The actors, including Nielsen as the wheeler-dealer and Christopher Lloyd as the kind apartment doorman, are all wonderful. The script is snappy and fun and the overall production values quite high. Yes, if only life could be this way! Orphaned children everywhere deserve a chance to prove that they are lovable and can give so much joy to the parents who are considering adoption. If you want to show a film to your family that is rooted in good values but is also highly entertaining, find this movie. It is guaranteed to have everyone laughing, even as their hearts are melting.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1969,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Drama","Family","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1995-11-04","keywords":"nightmare,boy,girl,dog,pet dog","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000558/","name":"Leslie Nielsen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000502/","name":"Christopher Lloyd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0566783/","name":"Matt McCoy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0314104/","name":"Fred Gerber"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011877/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0012575/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044583/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0076602/","name":"Paul Bernbaum"],"duration":"PT1H25M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Flyboys
Heroji neba
programme.desc:
Flyboys: Directed by Tony Bill. With James Franco, Scott Hazell, Mac McDonald, Philip Winchester. The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0454824/","name":"Flyboys","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYxMDg5NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjA4MDUzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0454824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mgenovese-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cinematic Clichés fly as often as the planes","reviewBody":"Do not expect much from the plot as you need not scratch the surface too deeply to experience de'ja vu. (I've seen these plot elements before in just about every war/buddy/love story flick I have ever seen). 

The acting is decent and the special effects are superb. Do not see this movie with high expectations regarding the plot and you will not be disappointed. 

The effects wizards took a page from Howard Hughes as there are plenty of clouds in the air combat scenes to lend a feeling of depth and speed. The dog fights are pretty exciting and worth the price of admission to see on the big screen.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":42270,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2006-09-22","keywords":"zeppelin,world war one,world war one soldier,flight,cockpit","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Flyboys","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3316056345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlhOGUxZWQtZTc5ZS00MDUxLTk0ZjAtOGRhOTE0ZWM1YTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODlhOGUxZWQtZTc5ZS00MDUxLTk0ZjAtOGRhOTE0ZWM1YTYxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"pre st, grn band, "Coming Soon", lbx"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000606/","name":"Jean Reno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213847/","name":"Jennifer Decker"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0082300/","name":"Tony Bill"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003899/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0229966/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0780785/","name":"Phil Sears"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262575/","name":"Blake T. programme.title: Zoom
Zoom
programme.desc:
Zoom: Directed by Peter Hewitt. With Tim Allen, Courteney Cox, Chevy Chase, Spencer Breslin. Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0383060/","name":"Zoom","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM0NjczMzUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDEwMjQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Former superhero Jack is called back to work to transform an unlikely group of ragtag kids into superheroes at a private academy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0383060/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"WyoFogg"},"dateCreated":"2006-08-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Someone lost the promise","reviewBody":"First off, a tiny bit about me. 1) I took my daughters (13 & 10) to this movie. 2) I tend to enjoy children's movies and I love SciFi. 3) My wife & I mostly agreed about the quality of this movie. 4) I've never rated a movie before.

Although I agree with many points from the first posting, I do think this movie *had* promise. It seems to me that if all characters were developed properly, that the screenplay had been more carefully thought out, that the technical filming of the show had gone better (boom mic!), that there was cohesiveness to the whole story, and that the actual plot had been more fully developed that this movie could have been spectacular. I was even willing to accept the story line until the kids were mysteriously found dutifully waiting in their room when they were supposed to be hiding. After that, it went downhill quickly for me.

I would have liked to see more exemplary development of the kids' powers -- the kind of foreshadowing that is later revealed in how they save the day (ie. A scene of Summer controlling the paint balls would have helped me believe better her focused power use in the end). Why spend all that time watching Cindy throw ton-weights at a target? How did Dylan's ability with the apple help in the end? What did they do with Tucker to help him learn to control his bloating? How is "mind sight" related to invisibility? Don't even get me started on Ms. Cox character (which I thought she played well).

The pacing and development of the two predictable romances was fair, but why not let Summer have a little tirade with Dylan for knowing he had "seen" her dancing? Followed up with Dylan's peace offering of the necklace pendant -- drama & release -- make the relationship grow on us.

The human stories here have to do with the kids as outcasts in life. Let's develop that more than the two short bits about the girls and Jack finally relating to Dylan. Zoom needed to grow with each kid to show his own growth and bring out his determination to succeed.

Then again, succeed at what? I think Tim Allen does a great job with the "unknown" aspect of the plot. He has no motivation, he gives none. But without a believable reason to drive the plot of the kids' training, we get what we saw. Also, there's nothing socially "dangerous" about the threat of Concussion - it seems a personal vendetta or overblown fear that Larraby is concerned about -- hardly enough to make me feel for him or his cause, and, unfortunately, the movie.

Finally, let's chew on continuity and technical prowess. I was thinking I saw the boom 5 times (but let's not quibble). Aren't people paid to notice these things (the director, even) during production? Let's keep track of where the characters are and give them a reason to go/be somewhere else. Let's give the characters more reason, heck even a strategy, to want to make and close a vortex. Let's see Rip Torn say the line that we watch him ventriloquize {sic}.

Would I watch it again? Maybe just to watch Zoom stumble again, see Houdini throw another punch, or see Summer be radiant -- OK, Cindy's got the tough-cute factor that can be enjoyable in moderation (pull up a chair, whydontya).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20570,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-08-11","keywords":"superhero,female hero,teenage superhero,superhero team,invisible man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Zoom (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2112028953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ3NDM3ZjYtOGFhYS00ZTU3LThhMmYtYTdlNjExODVlM2M5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQ3NDM3ZjYtOGFhYS00ZTU3LThhMmYtYTdlNjExODVlM2M5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"pre st, "This Summer", "August", lbx"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000741/","name":"Tim Allen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000331/","name":"Chevy Chase"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0382072/","name":"Peter Hewitt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050544/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080834/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0726472/","name":"Adam Rifkin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1183854/","name":"David Berenbaum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504670/","name":"Jason Lethcoe"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Knowing
Proročanstva
programme.desc:
Knowing: Directed by Alex Proyas. With Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne, Lara Robinson. M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448011/","name":"Knowing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyMjgyMDIyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg3MjAyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448011/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pugmahorn"},"dateCreated":"2009-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Good, The Bad and the Ugly","reviewBody":"The good: Strong start to the movie, the plot hooks you in, excellent sound, confronting disaster scenes, haunting images, Rose Byrne, at times quite freaky, The Bad: Special effects looked like they were from a video game, ripped off basically every science fiction movie ever made, poor acting from Nic Cage, very predictable.

The Ugly: Last third of movie was shamefully ridiculous.

Summary: If you are a science fiction fan, you will probably not be able to resist seeing this movie. Be warned, you will think you are seeing the sci-fi great that you have been waiting for but mid way the film gets lost. You may very well groan out loud at the ending. M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448011/","name":"Knowing","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyMjgyMDIyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjg3MjAyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448011/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pugmahorn","dateCreated":"2009-03-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Good, The Bad and the Ugly","reviewBody":"The good: Strong start to the movie, the plot hooks you in, excellent sound, confronting disaster scenes, haunting images, Rose Byrne, at times quite freaky, The Bad: Special effects looked like they were from a video game, ripped off basically every science fiction movie ever made, poor acting from Nic Cage, very predictable.

The Ugly: Last third of movie was shamefully ridiculous.

Battle: Los Angeles: Directed by Jonathan Liebesman. With Aaron Eckhart, Ramon Rodriguez, Will Rothhaar, Cory Hardrict. A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1217613/","name":"Battle: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDg2NzQwOGMtMGRkNC00YjAwLTg4NjgtZWQwYzljZmM1YzA4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A squad of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1217613/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sstallion"},"dateCreated":"2011-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Finally ... What I wanted to see after I watched the trailer for Skyline !!!!","reviewBody":"I went into this movie with low expectations after the relative disappointment which was skyline, a film that promised so much from the trailer and delivered far less.

However, im glad to say any misgivings I had were quickly expelled. Now don't get me wrong, this isn't the greatest film ever made, and in many ways it fails to hold a candle to the likes of independence day, which in my opinion is one of the greatest films of its type ever made. It does however, bring a much more up close and personal aspect to an alien invasion. Its more like watching a war filmed in Iraq or something, but that in itself is what separates it from a muddle of recent alien invasion movies that fails to ignite any kind of fire in the mind.

The film moves at an unrelenting pace, with good action sequences and cgi to boot, its predictable at times and the ending fails to come up with something clever or original, but hey ... you cant have everything !!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177737,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-03-11","keywords":"invasion,alien invasion,extraterrestrial,male lieutenant,wounded man","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Battle: Los Angeles - Nothing Can Prepare You","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3897661977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Nzc5MzQxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTk5MDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch an exclusive trailer for the new film Battle: Los Angeles."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001173/","name":"Aaron Eckhart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0509448/","name":"Jonathan Liebesman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0078203/","name":"Christopher Bertolini"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Serenity
Sereniti
programme.desc:
Serenity: Directed by Joss Whedon. With Nathan Fillion, Gina Torres, Alan Tudyk, Morena Baccarin. The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0379786/","name":"Serenity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE2MDAwZjEtODEyOS00ZjYyLTgzNDUtYmNiY2VmNWRiMTQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture telepath River.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0379786/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kari_d"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch "Firefly" first to really appreciate it!","reviewBody":"My husband and I first saw this movie after just reading these excellent reviews and not knowing anything else about the movie or characters. We are both sci-fi fans.

I must say, we were a little puzzled about the great reviews. We thought the one-liners were kind of cheesy, the acting a bit poor, and we weren't at all impressed (except for maybe the fight scenes with River). The cowboy theme music didn't sit well with us either.

However, I have heard only excellent things about the series Firefly and the following movie Serenity. Were we missing something? We even watched Serenity again giving it a second chance. It still didn't click with us. I was very confused.

We were going to give up when a friend loaned us the Firefly DVDs. OK, I'll give it another shot since clearly we *must* be missing something! And that did it.

After just a couple episodes I was really enjoying myself. When I re-watched Serenity again after seeing the TV series, I thought it was excellent. I really appreciated it. The characters were more 3D, the one-liners were amusing, the music didn't bother me a bit (I was starting to like it), and I really liked all the nuances from the actors (I changed my mind - not bad acting). I felt like I knew the characters and story so much better and I really loved how they tied some loose ends together. It was also nice to see the characters again after the series ended (even on DVD).

So bottom line - if you didn't watch Firefly, you probably won't get it, may not like it very much, and you might be confused why there are such great reviews. If you did watch Firefly first (and liked it), you'll love Serenity and you'll have a great ride!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":290568,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2006-05-31","keywords":"reavers,captain,26th century,megacorporation,on the run","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Serenity Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3489464857","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMDQyNDUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjE3NTczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUwMDQyNDUwM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjE3NTczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"For test purposes only."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0277213/","name":"Nathan Fillion"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868659/","name":"Gina Torres"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0252230/","name":"Chiwetel Ejiofor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923736/","name":"Joss Whedon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018092/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0923736/","name":"Joss Whedon"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Equilibrium
Ekvilibrij
programme.desc: Equilibrium: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Christian Bale, Dominic Purcell, Sean Bean, Christian Kahrmann. In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0238380/","name":"Equilibrium","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzA1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUyMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0238380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"IrisGoeth"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"but seriously... Could Christian Bale be any better?","reviewBody":"My review is one on Christian Bale rather than the movie per se. His going from stone-cold to an emotional man is simply flawless. He gets to transmit everything the story needs at the right time. Bale is the greatest actor of his generation and never afraid to get his hands REALLY dirty. He's played a highly controversial psycho (in an admittedly light version of a really crude and insightful novel... But you realise after you watch him, every time you read the novel again HE IS Patrick Bateman), a LITERALLY starving and tormented loner (please see The Machinist if only for his PERFECT, ground-breaking work of art, which includes both his acting skills and his beyond-emaciated body), a hopeful gay teenager turned hopeless adult (Velvet Goldmine, where he's amazingly accurate in a minor -as length goes- role and you really believe he's a shy and lively teenager and minutes later you believe he's a weary, melancholy adult), a conflicted superhero (the best Batman by far, followed by Michael Keaton of course) and all sorts of middle-of-the-road characters. He's not your average mainstream star and he'll never be, I hope... He's too much in love with his work to become that. Good for him.\n\nEquilibrium is a very fine movie. Highly entertaining, the score was more than okay, the casting does a really good job (I liked The Matrix -although I prefer Equilibrium's sobriety and rhythm, which many may find boring-, but come on... The actors were inferior and I'm sorry but Keanu Reeves just can't make it. Where Bale is all complex, nuanced and charismatic, Reeves is just handsome wood) and the fight scenes are beautiful to look at. Cons are the Father, who seemed too weak to me, and the ending which doesn't do justice to what comes before. In any case, this is an above-average sci-fi flick. IMDb data; ttnr: 0238380, Title: Equilibrium, --- Description: Equilibrium: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Christian Bale, Dominic Purcell, Sean Bean, Christian Kahrmann. In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0238380/","name":"Equilibrium","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzA1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUyMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0238380/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"IrisGoeth","dateCreated":"2008-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"but seriously... Could Christian Bale be any better?","reviewBody":"My review is one on Christian Bale rather than the movie per se. His going from stone-cold to an emotional man is simply flawless. He gets to transmit everything the story needs at the right time. Bale is the greatest actor of his generation and never afraid to get his hands REALLY dirty. He's played a highly controversial psycho (in an admittedly light version of a really crude and insightful novel... But you realise after you watch him, every time you read the novel again HE IS Patrick Bateman), a LITERALLY starving and tormented loner (please see The Machinist if only for his PERFECT, ground-breaking work of art, which includes both his acting skills and his beyond-emaciated body), a hopeful gay teenager turned hopeless adult (Velvet Goldmine, where he's amazingly accurate in a minor -as length goes- role and you really believe he's a shy and lively teenager and minutes later you believe he's a weary, melancholy adult), a conflicted superhero (the best Batman by far, followed by Michael Keaton of course) and all sorts of middle-of-the-road characters. He's not your average mainstream star and he'll never be, I hope... He's too much in love with his work to become that. Good for him.\n\nEquilibrium is a very fine movie. Highly entertaining, the score was more than okay, the casting does a really good job (I liked The Matrix -although I prefer Equilibrium's sobriety and rhythm, which many may find boring-, but come on... The actors were inferior and I'm sorry but Keanu Reeves just can't make it. Where Bale is all complex, nuanced and charismatic, Reeves is just handsome wood) and the fight scenes are beautiful to look at. Cons are the Father, who seemed too weak to me, and the ending which doesn't do justice to what comes before. In any case, this is an above-average sci-fi flick. Take a look.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":320542,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2005-01-12","keywords":"dystopia,suppression of emotion,gun fu,law,brainwashing","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Equilibrium","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi368025113","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NmRmYzUtYzM3MS00OWU0LTgzYmMtNzc2OTFkZGZhMzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NmRmYzUtYzM3MS00OWU0LTgzYmMtNzc2OTFkZGZhMzI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000288/","name":"Christian Bale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000293/","name":"Sean Bean","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001833/","name":"Emily Watson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007610/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934483/","name":"Kurt Wimmer"],"duration":"PT1H47M"</script><metacontent="

The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7555294/","name":"L.A.'s Finest","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjVlMzZkMTYtYjFiYy00Njc4LTk2NmMtYmRhZjJmZjcxNDg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The spinoff series of Bad Boys films focuses on drug enforcement agent Sydney Burnett, now working for the Los Angeles Police Department.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7555294/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ladywriter56"},"dateCreated":"2019-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good","reviewBody":"After reading all the negative reviews on this I'm wondering what exactly does today's audience want in a cop series? More sex, language, unreal car chases? Less plot and enough action sequences in one episode to give your brain an epileptic seizure? After getting hooked on fun, entertaining shows like The Good Cop and Battle Creek only to have them cancelled after one season, I give up trying to figure out today's viewers. No, LA's Finest isn't perfect (or totally realistic, but hey, what show is?). Yet it's pretty engaging. The story lines keep me coming back for more episodes and I think the acting is pretty good. But what do I know?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6638,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2019-05-13","keywords":"location in series title,female police officer,female police detective,buddy cop,police partner police partner relationship","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004695/","name":"Jessica Alba"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005517/","name":"Gabrielle Union"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0552222/","name":"Duane Martin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0102770/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0746691/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0354076/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2474120/","name":"Brandon Margolis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1228961/","name":"Brandon Sonnier"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi100121881","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTcwMDdiNGEtNmM5Mi00NDgwLThmMDAtN2VkYmU1YzAzZjY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Breed
The Shield
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Profileri

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

programme.title: SEAL Team

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

programme.title: Tuđinka
programme.desc: Serija priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Outlander je televizijska serija temeljena na istoimenoj povijesnoj seriji romana koju je napisala Diana Gabaldon, prateći priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Nakon završetka Drugog svjetskog rata Claire Randall konačno se ponovno sastaje sa suprugom Frankom.

programme.title: The Breed
The Shield
programme.desc: The Breed: Directed by Nicholas Mastandrea. With Michelle Rodriguez, Oliver Hudson, Taryn Manning, Eric Lively. A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0455362/","name":"The Breed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjg5ODA5MzAxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzkyNDM2MTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0455362/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ThrownMuse"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stupid but entertaining","reviewBody":"A bunch of undergrads (played by 30 and 40somethings--no joke!) take their jet to an abandoned island for a vacation. Because undergrads do that? They get attacked by wild dogs that turn out to be genetically engineered killers. Scary! History has taught me to stay away from anything labeled "Wes Craven Presents," but I decided to check this out because how bad could a movie starring Michelle Rodriguez vs Killer Dogs be? Rodriguez isn't the best actress, but I always enjoy seeing her one-note tough-girl shtick in movies or TV (long live Ana Lucia!) And she does her own stunts in this! There's no CGI, which is commendable, though I'm not entirely sure how I feel about a large number of dogs being trained to attack for the sake of a dumb horror movie. And this is, indeed, a dumb horror movie. All the clichés are intact, the writing is awful, and there's even a dumb subplot about brotherly love. Or something. Taryn Manning is cast as the "hottie" of the group, though she looks washed-up and talks like she smokes six packs a day. There's an interesting subplot with her character that would have made the movie more interesting had it been expanded upon. This is enjoyable for what it is, but it's nothing special.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13037,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Horror"],"datePublished":"2008-01-30","keywords":"island,cabin in the woods,animal attack,survival,natural horror","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Breed (2006)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1938424089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDJlZmNhMjItMGM4Zi00MGEyLThkNzUtZGJhY2MyOTQwNDVjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0735442/","name":"Michelle Rodriguez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005029/","name":"Oliver Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543383/","name":"Taryn Manning"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0557608/","name":"Nicholas Mastandrea"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049118/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148083/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068448/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176256/","name":"Robert Conte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0941810/","name":"Peter Wortmann"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Totalcar
programme.desc: Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije! Najpopularnija mađarska emisija za sve ljubitelje automobila. Uživajte u zanimljivim i informativnim minutama ove serije!

programme.title: Profileri

Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Mercedes Mason, Melissa O'Neil, Afton Williamson, Eric Winter

programme.desc:
SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rjtyler-23638"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what you would expect from an military show","reviewBody":"When I first saw this, i took it to be a typical wave the flag, the American Military is here to save the day show. And in some aspects it is that, but it is also so much more.

This is a deep dive into the physiological impacts of war, terrorism and how people cope with the high pressure costs, not only on the battlefield, but on their mental stability, and physical make up.

This is not you typical military drama and is well worth the watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20878,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tuđinka
programme.desc: Serija priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Outlander je televizijska serija temeljena na istoimenoj povijesnoj seriji romana koju je napisala Diana Gabaldon, prateći priču o medicinskoj sestri koja se misteriozno vraća dva stoljeća unatrag u prošlost. Nakon završetka Drugog svjetskog rata Claire Randall konačno se ponovno sastaje sa suprugom Frankom.

programme.title: Gran Hotel
Grand Hotel
programme.desc: Gran Hotel: With Adriana Ozores, Amaia Salamanca, Yon González, Eloy Azorín. A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2006421/","name":"Gran Hotel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk2MjQyNTAzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI3OTM3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2006421/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iammelba"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Couldn't stop at just one episode.","reviewBody":"This show is sooooooo addicting. programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.Uz napete trenutke ove serije, saznajte ishod tajnih misija ovih hrabrih vojnika!

programme.title: Tehnološke Igračke
programme.desc: Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Zajedno otputujte u svijet visoke tehnologije u kojoj možete otkriti niz revolucionarnih izuma i vozila iz budućnosti. Ako ste ljubitelj tehnologije, opustite se i uživajte u ovoj seriji!

programme.title: Gran Hotel
Grand Hotel
programme.desc: Gran Hotel: With Adriana Ozores, Amaia Salamanca, Yon González, Eloy Azorín. A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2006421/","name":"Gran Hotel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTk2MjQyNTAzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODI3OTM3MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family-owned hotel in the fictional coastal Spanish town of Cantaloa in 1905: love, blackmail, jealousies, crime, comedy, and plots and counter-plots all involving the hotel's owners, guests, detectives, and residential employees.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2006421/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iammelba"},"dateCreated":"2018-06-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Couldn't stop at just one episode.","reviewBody":"This show is sooooooo addicting. The twists and turns throughout every single episode leaves you sitting on the edge of your seat. The show is so riveting that you forget you're reading subtitles. And just when I thought I had every character figured out, another twist happens. \n\nI enjoyed this series so much that I just may go back and watch it all again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2011-10-04","keywords":"telenovela,spain","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654841/","name":"Adriana Ozores"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2319146/","name":"Amaia Salamanca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2304398/","name":"Yon González"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0249391/"}]}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: Navy SEAL američka je serija o članovima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne misije boreći se protiv terorizma. Navy SEAL serija je o pripadnicima najelitnije specijalne jedinice koji kreću u opasne i riskantne misije u koje ih domovina šalje. Njihov je cilj uništiti terorizam, a tim dobro obučenih vojnika suočava se s time svakodnevno.Uz napete trenutke ove serije, saznajte ishod tajnih misija ovih hrabrih vojnika!

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc:
SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rjtyler-23638"},"dateCreated":"2021-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what you would expect from an military show","reviewBody":"When I first saw this, i took it to be a typical wave the flag, the American Military is here to save the day show. And in some aspects it is that, but it is also so much more.

This is a deep dive into the physiological impacts of war, terrorism and how people cope with the high pressure costs, not only on the battlefield, but on their mental stability, and physical make up.

This is not you typical military drama and is well worth the watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20878,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"military,u.s. military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tehnološke Igračke
programme.desc: Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Dokumentarna serija "Tehnološke igračke" vodi vas u svijet tehnologije, upoznaje gledatelje pred malim ekranima s mnogim prometnim inovacijama. Zajedno otputujte u svijet visoke tehnologije u kojoj možete otkriti niz revolucionarnih izuma i vozila iz budućnosti. Ako ste ljubitelj tehnologije, opustite se i uživajte u ovoj seriji!
