programme.sub-title: S1 E3 S1 E3 Reg

credits.actor: Tim Roth, Nico Mirallegro, Samantha Morton, Jodie Comer

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 5568438, Title: Rillington Place, --- Description: Rillington Place: With Tim Roth, Nico Mirallegro, Samantha Morton, Jodie Comer. A three-part drama about serial killer John Christie and the murders at 10 Rillington Place in the 1940s and early 1950s." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5568438/","name":"Rillington Place","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmQzOThmYzMtNGQwZi00MDcwLWFhOWMtNmQ4ZjgzNzg4OWMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A three-part drama about serial killer John Christie and the murders at 10 Rillington Place in the 1940s and early 1950s.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5568438/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon","dateCreated":"2016-12-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Oh boy this is not for the faint hearted.","reviewBody":"I have wondered for many years why there had been no attempt to retell the grizzly story of the goings on at number 10 Rillington Place. The fabulous 1971 version featuring the marvellous Richard Attenborough will live on as a classic forever. So once again, well done BBC for retelling a story in such a thorough and compelling way.

The three hour format worked well, it allowed the story to develop naturally, at no point did it feel rushed, each character was given time to deliver.

Tim Roth was sensational in the role of Christie, softly spoken, calm, yet monstrous and conniving, I believed utterly in the character he portrayed. He certainly looked the part also. It feels unkind to say that Samantha Morton is a safe pair of hands, but that she is, an actress of immense talent, who always seems to deliver the goods, a super performance as Mrs Christie.

This drama made me curious about the case, and I've picked up a book for some further reading.

If I was brutally honest, I'd say Part 1 was a little too slow, and felt like it had been padded out, twenty minutes into the second part though it takes a very sinister turn, and transforms into something nasty, but enthralling.

Harsh, unnerving, but very impressive. 9/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3468,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2016-11-29","keywords":"1940s,serial killer,tv mini series,based on true story,1950s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000619/","name":"Tim Roth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2813963/","name":"Nico Mirallegro","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0608090/","name":"Samantha Morton"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0527221/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0592426/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4034509081","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkzYTZjZWQtNjVlOS00N2Q1LWE5YTMtYjViNmNmMmNjMDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzkzYTZjZWQtNjVlOS00N2Q1LWE5YTMtYjViNmNmMmNjMDRhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A three-part scripted drama based on the real-life multiple murders carried out by John Christie (Roth) in Notting Hill in the 1940s and 50s."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janice-lowing","dateCreated":"2012-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Message from 'down under'","reviewBody":"There are so few shows that I thoroughly enjoy. Murchoch Mysteries is one of 4 particular shows that I watch regularly - and tape so that I do not miss them.

There are three main reasons that I like MM.

First, it is such a pleasure to watch something that does not have swearing, sex scenes, and gratuitous violence. Even though there are the odd (bordering on) romantic interludes the story line remains true to the theme of the title and they do not over-shadow the stories.

Second, I quite like viewing shows that depict times gone by and it is interesting to see how detectives'/police duties were (supposedly) undertaken in that time.

Third, the acting and story telling - as noted in a previous post - equals that of Midsummer Murders, Poirot (another favourite of mine), Judge John Deed (again, another favourite).

I like each character who has a distinct role and adds to the show as well as the enjoyment of watching the show. I do hope that there are quite a few new series planned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Yannick Bisson (role=Detective William Murdoch), Helene Joy (role=Dr. Julia Ogden), Thomas Craig (role=Inspector Thomas Brackenreid), Jonny Harris (role=Constable George Crabtree), Lachlan Murdoch (role=Constable Henry Higgins), Georgina Reilly (role=Dr. Emily Grace), Daniel Maslany (role=Detective Llewellyn Watts), Shanice Banton (role=Violet Hart), Arwen Humphreys (role=Margaret Brackenreid), Kristian Bruun (role=Constable Slugger Jackson), Mouna Traoré (role=Rebecca James), Bea Santos (role=Louise Cherry)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janice-lowing","dateCreated":"2012-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Message from 'down under'","reviewBody":"There are so few shows that I thoroughly enjoy. Murchoch Mysteries is one of 4 particular shows that I watch regularly - and tape so that I do not miss them.

There are three main reasons that I like MM.

First, it is such a pleasure to watch something that does not have swearing, sex scenes, and gratuitous violence. Even though there are the odd (bordering on) romantic interludes the story line remains true to the theme of the title and they do not over-shadow the stories.

Second, I quite like viewing shows that depict times gone by and it is interesting to see how detectives'/police duties were (supposedly) undertaken in that time.

Third, the acting and story telling - as noted in a previous post - equals that of Midsummer Murders, Poirot (another favourite of mine), Judge John Deed (again, another favourite).

I like each character who has a distinct role and adds to the show as well as the enjoyment of watching the show. programme.title: Murdoch Mysteries

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janice-lowing","dateCreated":"2012-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Message from 'down under'","reviewBody":"There are so few shows that I thoroughly enjoy. Murchoch Mysteries is one of 4 particular shows that I watch regularly - and tape so that I do not miss them.

There are three main reasons that I like MM.

First, it is such a pleasure to watch something that does not have swearing, sex scenes, and gratuitous violence. Even though there are the odd (bordering on) romantic interludes the story line remains true to the theme of the title and they do not over-shadow the stories.

Second, I quite like viewing shows that depict times gone by and it is interesting to see how detectives'/police duties were (supposedly) undertaken in that time.

Third, the acting and story telling - as noted in a previous post - equals that of Midsummer Murders, Poirot (another favourite of mine), Judge John Deed (again, another favourite).

I like each character who has a distinct role and adds to the show as well as the enjoyment of watching the show. I do hope that there are quite a few new series planned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janice-lowing","dateCreated":"2012-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Message from 'down under'","reviewBody":"There are so few shows that I thoroughly enjoy. Murchoch Mysteries is one of 4 particular shows that I watch regularly - and tape so that I do not miss them.

There are three main reasons that I like MM.

First, it is such a pleasure to watch something that does not have swearing, sex scenes, and gratuitous violence. Even though there are the odd (bordering on) romantic interludes the story line remains true to the theme of the title and they do not over-shadow the stories.

Second, I quite like viewing shows that depict times gone by and it is interesting to see how detectives'/police duties were (supposedly) undertaken in that time.

Third, the acting and story telling - as noted in a previous post - equals that of Midsummer Murders, Poirot (another favourite of mine), Judge John Deed (again, another favourite).

I like each character who has a distinct role and adds to the show as well as the enjoyment of watching the show. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janice-lowing","dateCreated":"2012-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Message from 'down under'","reviewBody":"There are so few shows that I thoroughly enjoy. Murchoch Mysteries is one of 4 particular shows that I watch regularly - and tape so that I do not miss them.

There are three main reasons that I like MM.

First, it is such a pleasure to watch something that does not have swearing, sex scenes, and gratuitous violence. Even though there are the odd (bordering on) romantic interludes the story line remains true to the theme of the title and they do not over-shadow the stories.

Second, I quite like viewing shows that depict times gone by and it is interesting to see how detectives'/police duties were (supposedly) undertaken in that time.

Third, the acting and story telling - as noted in a previous post - equals that of Midsummer Murders, Poirot (another favourite of mine), Judge John Deed (again, another favourite).

I like each character who has a distinct role and adds to the show as well as the enjoyment of watching the show. I do hope that there are quite a few new series planned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: All Creatures Great and Small
All Creatures Great and Small
programme.sub-title: S2 E5 The Last Man In
programme.desc:
All Creatures Great and Small: With Nicholas Ralph, Anna Madeley, Samuel West, Rachel Shenton. The numerous adventures of a friendly staff at a country veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10590066/","name":"All Creatures Great and Small","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGU5NGRiMjAtMTJhYy00ZmNjLWJiNzktYTMwZTNhNzI1NTM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3ODk4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The numerous adventures of a friendly staff at a country veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10590066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"I wasn't expecting that.","reviewBody":"I think it's fair to say that some, myself included wrote this off before it had even aired, Channel five hasn't really been known for original drama. I was definitely wrong, it's a great watch.

Channel Five has a real winner with his show, it is truly the tonic we need for 2020, it's uplifting, sentimental, it has a real feel good factor.

A winner in all areas, great stories, terrific acting, and a warmth that has been lacking in shows for some time.

How lovely to see Diana Rigg appear, ahead of her tragic death.

Bang on the money, 9/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6292,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-01","keywords":"yorkshire,veterinarian,countryside,rural setting,1930s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11013770/","name":"Nicholas Ralph"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534777/","name":"Anna Madeley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922335/","name":"Samuel West"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0361727/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2069741081","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYyMjM4MDMtMjA5My00ZDI3LTlhNjctNjU4YjhkMzJiMjE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYyMjM4MDMtMjA5My00ZDI3LTlhNjctNjU4YjhkMzJiMjE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Since their first publication in 1970, the beloved books of James Alfred Wight, published under the pen name James Herriot, have held a special place in people’s hearts throughout the world. Chronicling the heartwarming and humorous adventures of a young country vet, the books introduced readers to his unconventional mentor and the cast of farmers and townsfolk who lived and worked in the Yorkshire Dales in the 1930s.

This new television adaptation will preserve the rich spirit, tone and values of Herriot’s iconic characters and stories and will bring to life his sharply observed, entertaining and incredibly funny tales of country life in the North of England for a modern audience, introducing a new generation to his life-affirming stories."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 10590066, Title: All Creatures Great and Small, --- Description: All Creatures Great and Small: With Nicholas Ralph, Anna Madeley, Samuel West, Rachel Shenton. The numerous adventures of a friendly staff at a country veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10590066/","name":"All Creatures Great and Small","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGU5NGRiMjAtMTJhYy00ZmNjLWJiNzktYTMwZTNhNzI1NTM5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3ODk4OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The numerous adventures of a friendly staff at a country veterinarian practice in 1930s to 1940s Yorkshire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10590066/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon","dateCreated":"2020-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"I wasn't expecting that.","reviewBody":"I think it's fair to say that some, myself included wrote this off before it had even aired, Channel five hasn't really been known for original drama. I was definitely wrong, it's a great watch.

Channel Five has a real winner with his show, it is truly the tonic we need for 2020, it's uplifting, sentimental, it has a real feel good factor.

A winner in all areas, great stories, terrific acting, and a warmth that has been lacking in shows for some time.

How lovely to see Diana Rigg appear, ahead of her tragic death.

Bang on the money, 9/10.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6292,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.5,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-01","keywords":"yorkshire,veterinarian,countryside,rural setting,1930s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm11013770/","name":"Nicholas Ralph","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0534777/","name":"Anna Madeley","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922335/","name":"Samuel West"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0361727/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2069741081","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYyMjM4MDMtMjA5My00ZDI3LTlhNjctNjU4YjhkMzJiMjE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDYyMjM4MDMtMjA5My00ZDI3LTlhNjctNjU4YjhkMzJiMjE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Since their first publication in 1970, the beloved books of James Alfred Wight, published under the pen name James Herriot, have held a special place in people’s hearts throughout the world. Chronicling the heartwarming and humorous adventures of a young country vet, the books introduced readers to his unconventional mentor and the cast of farmers and townsfolk who lived and worked in the Yorkshire Dales in the 1930s.

This new television adaptation will preserve the rich spirit, tone and values of Herriot’s iconic characters and stories and will bring to life his sharply observed, entertaining and incredibly funny tales of country life in the North of England for a modern audience, introducing a new generation to his life-affirming stories."</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1091909, Title: Murdoch Mysteries, --- Description: Murdoch Mysteries: Created by Cal Coons, Alexandra Zarowny, Maureen Jennings, Bob Carney. With Yannick Bisson, Helene Joy, Thomas Craig, Jonny Harris. In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1091909/","name":"Murdoch Mysteries","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMwNjkzNDU4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDUxMTAyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1890s, William Murdoch uses radical forensic techniques for the time, including fingerprinting and trace evidence, to solve some of the city's most gruesome murders.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1091909/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"janice-lowing","dateCreated":"2012-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Message from 'down under'","reviewBody":"There are so few shows that I thoroughly enjoy. Murchoch Mysteries is one of 4 particular shows that I watch regularly - and tape so that I do not miss them.

There are three main reasons that I like MM.

First, it is such a pleasure to watch something that does not have swearing, sex scenes, and gratuitous violence. Even though there are the odd (bordering on) romantic interludes the story line remains true to the theme of the title and they do not over-shadow the stories.

Second, I quite like viewing shows that depict times gone by and it is interesting to see how detectives'/police duties were (supposedly) undertaken in that time.

Third, the acting and story telling - as noted in a previous post - equals that of Midsummer Murders, Poirot (another favourite of mine), Judge John Deed (again, another favourite).

I like each character who has a distinct role and adds to the show as well as the enjoyment of watching the show. I do hope that there are quite a few new series planned.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":12369,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-01-01","keywords":"detective,police detective,morgue,police station,whodunit","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0084370/","name":"Yannick Bisson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0431420/","name":"Helene Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186030/","name":"Thomas Craig"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014501/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0382999/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0052272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1779939/","name":"Cal Coons","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953567/","name":"Alexandra Zarowny","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1485610/","name":"Maureen Jennings"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2131996697","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmIwY2Y4ZGMtOTlmNi00ZDA4LTg5MGMtM2NjN2E0YTY3ZTgzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Murdoch Mysteries: Season 8"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Simmons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1556631/","name":"Corey Reynolds"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035643/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0294955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240384/","name":"James Duff"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fate Line - Clip #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3810788121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from an episode of "The Closer," which airs at 9 p.m. Mondays on TNT."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. IMDb data; ttnr: 0458253, Title: The Closer, --- Description: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719","dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. programme.title: Agatha Raisin
Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: Agatha Raisin: Created by M.C. Beaton. With Ashley Jensen, Matt McCooey, Mathew Horne, Jamie Glover. The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5015548/","name":"Agatha Raisin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI4ZmUwMGItZGJkYi00MGEyLTg2MGUtOWQ0Y2Y5N2M1MzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5015548/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zdarov"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hope it keeps going!","reviewBody":"It took a while for this show to grow on me. Agatha's 'girly' facet didn't register at first, now I think it's a hoot. She's a really interesting character, and wonderfully played. *All* the actors are excellent. Her best friend Gemma is subtly divine. The two policemen each in their own way are wonderful. I've come to love the show, and really hope they will keep it going. We needed something to fill the gap of clever and engaging 'murder and tea.' No ugliness, shouting, acrimony, etc. Of course, the setting is gorgeous. Agatha has given up the bustle of the city and moved to the Cotswolds. So you get some of those 'quirky village characters' that Midsomer Murders excelled at. If you're a fan of Miss Marple and Poirot shows, or Miss Fisher's murder mysteries, you should really give this a try.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3904,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-12-26","keywords":"based on series of novels,amateur detective,rural setting,village,cotswolds","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421332/","name":"Ashley Jensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1838009/","name":"Matt McCooey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1328703/","name":"Mathew Horne"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0512059/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221332/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103820/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014429/","name":"M.C. Beaton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kissing Christmas Goodbye Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3285893913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Agatha Raisin is back with an all-new Christmas mystery! programme.title: Agatha Raisin
Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: Agatha Raisin: Created by M.C. Beaton. With Ashley Jensen, Matt McCooey, Mathew Horne, Jamie Glover. The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5015548/","name":"Agatha Raisin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI4ZmUwMGItZGJkYi00MGEyLTg2MGUtOWQ0Y2Y5N2M1MzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5015548/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zdarov"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hope it keeps going!","reviewBody":"It took a while for this show to grow on me. Agatha's 'girly' facet didn't register at first, now I think it's a hoot. She's a really interesting character, and wonderfully played. *All* the actors are excellent. Her best friend Gemma is subtly divine. The two policemen each in their own way are wonderful. I've come to love the show, and really hope they will keep it going. We needed something to fill the gap of clever and engaging 'murder and tea.' No ugliness, shouting, acrimony, etc. Of course, the setting is gorgeous. Agatha has given up the bustle of the city and moved to the Cotswolds. So you get some of those 'quirky village characters' that Midsomer Murders excelled at. If you're a fan of Miss Marple and Poirot shows, or Miss Fisher's murder mysteries, you should really give this a try.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3904,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-12-26","keywords":"based on series of novels,amateur detective,rural setting,village,cotswolds","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421332/","name":"Ashley Jensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1838009/","name":"Matt McCooey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1328703/","name":"Mathew Horne"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0512059/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221332/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103820/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014429/","name":"M.C. Beaton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kissing Christmas Goodbye Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3285893913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Agatha Raisin is back with an all-new Christmas mystery! A woman haunted by her ghosts of Christmas past hires Agatha for protection, but when the woman is found dead, everyone is a suspect."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bull
Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5827228/","name":"Bull","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA1NDkyNjE4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDM5NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Brilliant, brash, and charming, Dr. Bull is the ultimate puppet master as he combines psychology, human intuition, and high-tech data to learn what makes jurors, attorneys, witnesses, and the accused tick.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wmboos"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stopped watching.","reviewBody":"I watched and somewhat enjoyed this show for the first 3 and a half seasons. The individual episodes are fine. They tell a story, Bull always wins for whichever side hires him, and the following week they start all over again. That's the problem. That and the utter lack of character development. I need the latter to enjoy any show I watch. However, if the former is all you need to enjoy a show, then by all means, enjoy this one. Each episode is a one off and taken individually, they're pretty much 7 star good. It's just not my thing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17347,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-09-20","keywords":"courtroom,trial,voir dire,lawyer,courtroom drama","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0915762/","name":"Michael Weatherly"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1417931/","name":"Geneva Carr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1830388/","name":"Jaime Lee Kirchner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065354/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0607737/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0169499/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001921/","name":"Paul Attanasio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1114695/","name":"Phil McGraw"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bull--Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi522762009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU1NDkxNDY4Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDIwNjg0OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Simmons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1556631/","name":"Corey Reynolds"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035643/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0294955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240384/","name":"James Duff"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fate Line - Clip #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3810788121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from an episode of "The Closer," which airs at 9 p.m. Mondays on TNT."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: NCIS-ovi agenti oslanjaju se na twitter u potrazi za nestalim mornaričkim poručnikom. U međuvremenu Mcgee je zametnuo značku, ali to krije od Gibbsa i nadređenih. NCIS-ovi agenti oslanjaju se na twitter u potrazi za nestalim mornaričkim poručnikom. U međuvremenu Mcgee je zametnuo značku, ali to krije od Gibbsa i nadređenih.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Vikar Sidney Chambers i njegov nasljednik velečasni Will Davenport udružuju snage s inspektorom Geordiem Keatingom kako bi istražili niz zastrašujućih zločina u njihovom nekoć mirnom selu. U petoj sezoni u Grantchesteru se pojavljuje novi vikar - Will Davenport čovjek blizak ljudima i pun ideala te ga ubrzo privuče detektiv inspektor Geordie Keating i njegov svijet ubojitih zapleta, zločina iz strasti i neočekivanih tragedija.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: Dvije žrtve nađene su u gradiću u zabačenom dijelu Zapadne Virginije. Bull
programme.desc: Bull: Created by Paul Attanasio, Phil McGraw. With Michael Weatherly, Geneva Carr, Jaime Lee Kirchner, Chris Jackson. The individual episodes are fine. They tell a story, Bull always wins for whichever side hires him, and the following week they start all over again. That's the problem. That and the utter lack of character development. I need the latter to enjoy any show I watch. However, if the former is all you need to enjoy a show, then by all means, enjoy this one. programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. programme.title: The Closer
Završni udarac
programme.desc: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719"},"dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. Simmons"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1556631/","name":"Corey Reynolds"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035643/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0294955/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0240384/","name":"James Duff"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fate Line - Clip #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3810788121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1NTQyNjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTc1OTIyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from an episode of "The Closer," which airs at 9 p.m. Mondays on TNT."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0458253, Title: The Closer, --- Description: The Closer: Created by James Duff. With Kyra Sedgwick, J.K. Simmons, Corey Reynolds, Robert Gossett. Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive cases." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0458253/","name":"The Closer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODg5MTc0MTg3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTUwNjAzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Deputy Police Chief Brenda Johnson runs the Priority Homicide Division of the LAPD with an unorthodox style. Her innate ability to read people and obtain confessions helps her and her team solve the city's toughest, most sensitive ca","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0458253/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"rogue719","dateCreated":"2006-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Wonderfully character driven laughs and drama","reviewBody":"An outstanding drama that dances on the edge of being a formula cop show and a soap opera. Brenda Lee Johnson is an outstanding interrogator with a background of being difficult to work with but achieving great results. However, her personal life is a mess. She is hired from Atlanta to head LAPD's Priority Crimes Unit for those high profile crimes that need a resolution and need it quickly. Tensions arise immediately. Her brusque style makes her own people want to transfer away, her boss is a former lover who dumped her and she manages to make many more enemies than friends. The crimes are formula enough that you can probably figure out whodunit before you get to the climax but it's the characters and relationships that sell the show and make it worth watching. Not only is Kyra Sedgwick giving the performance of her life in this series but she has a terrific supporting cast that gives the series heart. The ability of the writers to also give us some great comic lines keeps the show teetering at times from comedy to drama. The first season is already out on DVD. Watch it from the first episode to the last, in order, and you can see why this show has become the most watched show in basic cable history.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24593,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-06-13","keywords":"strong female character,21st century,fbi federal bureau of investigation,criminal investigation,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001718/","name":"Kyra Sedgwick","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0799777/","name":"J.K. programme.title: Agatha Raisin
Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: Agatha Raisin: Created by M.C. Beaton. With Ashley Jensen, Matt McCooey, Mathew Horne, Jamie Glover. The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt5015548/","name":"Agatha Raisin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGI4ZmUwMGItZGJkYi00MGEyLTg2MGUtOWQ0Y2Y5N2M1MzgwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjExMjk0ODk@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5015548/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zdarov"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Hope it keeps going!","reviewBody":"It took a while for this show to grow on me. Agatha's 'girly' facet didn't register at first, now I think it's a hoot. She's a really interesting character, and wonderfully played. *All* the actors are excellent. Her best friend Gemma is subtly divine. The two policemen each in their own way are wonderful. I've come to love the show, and really hope they will keep it going. We needed something to fill the gap of clever and engaging 'murder and tea.' No ugliness, shouting, acrimony, etc. Of course, the setting is gorgeous. Agatha has given up the bustle of the city and moved to the Cotswolds. So you get some of those 'quirky village characters' that Midsomer Murders excelled at. If you're a fan of Miss Marple and Poirot shows, or Miss Fisher's murder mysteries, you should really give this a try.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3904,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-12-26","keywords":"based on series of novels,amateur detective,rural setting,village,cotswolds","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421332/","name":"Ashley Jensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1838009/","name":"Matt McCooey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1328703/","name":"Mathew Horne"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0512059/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0221332/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103820/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1014429/","name":"M.C. Beaton"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kissing Christmas Goodbye Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3285893913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5OWMxMDgtMjE4Ni00ZmU3LWEwZWItNzk3ZDQyOTljM2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Agatha Raisin is back with an all-new Christmas mystery! programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Ubojstvo žene koja oponaša preminula vojnika dovest će Gibbsa do afganistanskog skloništa za žene za koje se nekoć zalagao Mike Franks. Muse Watson je u gostujućoj ulozi kao Mike Franks. Ubojstvo žene koja oponaša preminula vojnika dovest će Gibbsa do afganistanskog skloništa za žene za koje se nekoć zalagao Mike Franks. Muse Watson je u gostujućoj ulozi kao Mike Franks.

programme.title: Grantchester
programme.desc: Vikar Sidney Chambers i njegov nasljednik velečasni Will Davenport udružuju snage s inspektorom Geordiem Keatingom kako bi istražili niz zastrašujućih zločina u njihovom nekoć mirnom selu. U petoj sezoni u Grantchesteru se pojavljuje novi vikar - Will Davenport čovjek blizak ljudima i pun ideala te ga ubrzo privuče detektiv inspektor Geordie Keating i njegov svijet ubojitih zapleta, zločina iz strasti i neočekivanih tragedija.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: Dvije žrtve nađene su u gradiću u zabačenom dijelu Zapadne Virginije. Jedinica za biheviorističke analize saznala je da su dvije obitelji u dugogodišnjoj zavadi i morat će otkriti koja je od njih... Dvije žrtve nađene su u gradiću u zabačenom dijelu Zapadne Virginije. Jedinica za biheviorističke analize saznala je da su dvije obitelji u dugogodišnjoj zavadi i morat će otkriti koja je od njih skrivila ubojstva.

Alex Hugo

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

Danny Masterson, Michael Cassidy, Adam Busch, Meredith Hagner, James Lesure, Stacy Keibler, Jessica Luza

programme.title: Zaposleni dečki
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Zaposleni dečki" donosi nam pustolovine četvero prijatelja zaposlenih u njujorškom časopisu. Humoristična serija "Zaposleni dečki" donosi nam pustolovine četvero prijatelja zaposlenih u njujorškom časopisu. Milo je momak koji je upravo završio dugogodišnju vezu i uz pomoć trojice svojih prijatelja, Tylera, Gibbsa i Neila, pokušava se vratiti u formu za zabavljanje i druženje. Ova se četiri prijatelja međusobno pomažu, kako u pogledu posla, tako i u pogledu međuljudskih, prijateljskih i ljubavnih odnosa. Neil je jedini koji ima djevojku. Ova grupa se osim na radnom mjestu okuplja i u slobodno vrijeme.

credits.actor: Charlie Sheen, Jon Cryer, Angus T. Jones, Marin Hinkle, Melanie Lynskey, Kristin Dattilo

programme.title: Malcolm u sredini
programme.desc: Lois je vidno iznervirana: Čak i za Božić njezini se dječaci jednostavno ne znaju ponašati. Francis dovodi doma neočekivanog gosta. Malcolm ne želi da ga doživljavaju kao štrebera, ali Lois ga posrami u školi. Reese maltretira druge, čak se potuče s kozom u zoološkom vrtu. Francis se suočava sa zlim kravama na farmi. Dewey nastupi u predstavi na koju njegova obitelj ne dođe.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

programme.title: Crna lista
programme.desc: Nakon što je desetljećima bio na popisu najtraženijih kriminalaca, Raymond "Red" Reddington (James Spader) predaje se FBI-u te im nudi svoju Crnu listu, popis najopasnijih svjetskih kriminalaca. Nakon što je desetljećima bio na popisu najtraženijih kriminalaca, Raymond "Red" Reddington (James Spader) predaje se FBI-u te im nudi svoju Crnu listu, popis najopasnijih i najskrovitijih svjetskih kriminalaca. Red tvrdi da može raskrinkati špijune, teroriste, ubojice koji rade za narkokartele, trgovce ljudima i osvetoljubive serijske ubojice, ali pod uvjetom da radi s novopečenom agenticom Elizabeth Keene (Megan Boone). Nakon što oprezno pristaje na njegov zahtjev, Liz shvaća da se ispod površine kriminalca krije zanimljiva osoba. Osim što je povezan sa smrću njezina oca, Red uvjerava Liz da njezin suprug Tom (Ryan Eggold) nije onakav kakvim se predstavlja. Kad Liz dozna da Tom samo iskorištava njihov brak kako bi je mogao potajno pratiti, Red postaje žrtva napada koji kriminalce s Crne liste poveže s Tomovim tajnim zadatkom, što njihov odnos ozbiljno naruši, a budućnost im nosi samo opasnosti i neizvjesnost.

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna im je zagonetka. Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Kako bi se razriješili brojni zločini, tu je ekipa za očevid CSI: Miami. Pred njima se nalaze mnogi zločini i misteriji koje treba riješiti, a predvodi ih poručnik Horatio Caine (David Caruso). Caine i Delko su u Brazilu. Odjel nakon Natalijinog prelaska u Policiju održava Duquesne. Čekaju ih istrage zločina, ali i rješavanje unutarnjih problema. Wolfe se slučajno upliće u krivotvorenje, a Duquesne je u istrazi bande ugrožen život….

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: Magnum i Higgins kreću u novi pohod za istinom. Pred njima je slučaj nestanka jedne osobe, a tijekom istrage Higgins biva pogođena... Jay Hernandez glumi Thomasa Magnuma u suvremenoj adaptaciji o bivšem pripadniku američkih specijalaca koji se vraća kući iz Afganistana i koristi svoje vojne vještine kako bi postao privatni detektiv na Havajima.

credits.actor: Jude Demorest, Brittany O'Grady, Ryan Destiny, Amiyah Scott, Quincy Brown, Miss Lawrence, Luke James, Lance Gross
Danny Masterson, Michael Cassidy, Adam Busch, Meredith Hagner, James Lesure, J.K. Simmons, Nora Kirkpatrick, Ethan Suplee

programme.title: Zaposleni dečki
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Zaposleni dečki" donosi nam pustolovine četvero prijatelja zaposlenih u njujorškom časopisu. Humoristična serija "Zaposleni dečki" donosi nam pustolovine četvero prijatelja zaposlenih u njujorškom časopisu. Milo je momak koji je upravo završio dugogodišnju vezu i uz pomoć trojice svojih prijatelja, Tylera, Gibbsa i Neila, pokušava se vratiti u formu za zabavljanje i druženje. Ova se četiri prijatelja međusobno pomažu, kako u pogledu posla, tako i u pogledu međuljudskih, prijateljskih i ljubavnih odnosa. Neil je jedini koji ima djevojku. Ova grupa se osim na radnom mjestu okuplja i u slobodno vrijeme.

programme.title: Crna lista
programme.desc: James Spader se vraća u sedmoj sezoni, u ulozi kriminalnog genija koji surađuje s FBI-em u borbi protiv terorizma. Ali on nije onaj za kojeg se predstavlja. Nakon zapanjujućeg otkrića da Raymond nije onaj za kojeg se predstavlja, Elizabeth rastrgana je između veze koju je razvila s čovjekom koji tvrdi da je njezin otac i njezine želje da dođe do dna godinama čuvanih laži i tajna.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Deseta sezona staroj ekipi donosi u život nove ljude poput djeteta Howarda i Bernadette, ali ljubavni problemi svih genijalaca su i dalje prisutni. U 8. sezoni serije, Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Penny (Kaley Cuoco) odlučili su okruniti svoju vezu brakom nakon nekoliko nespretnih prekida u prošlosti. Čak je i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) pronašao družicu te je sklopio "ugovor o vezi" s neurobiologinjom Amy Farrah Fowler (Mayim Bialik), koja ipak traži pauzu jer joj smeta spori napredak njihove veze. Dok Bernadette (Melissa Rauch) pomaže Howardu (Simon Helberg) da se pomiri sa smrću njegove majke, sramežljivi Raj (Kunal Nayyar) nastavlja svoju dosad najdugovječniju vezu s Emily (Laura Spencer).

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna im je zagonetka. Oni su bez sumnje genijalni, no zašto im je onda tako teško prići ljepšem spolu? Uz pomoć Kaley Cuoco, prijatelji će naučiti najvažniju životnu lekciju!Leonard (Johnny Galecki) i Sheldon (Jim Parsons) mogu vam ispričati sve što vas zanima o kvantnoj fizici, no rješavanje najjednostavnijih stvari iz svakodnevnog života potpuna je zagonetka dvojici prijatelja. Oni su briljantni fizičari koji mogu shvatiti kako svemir funkcionira, no kako komunicirati s ljudima, osobito djevojkama, potpuni im je misterij. To se počinje mijenjati kada se Penny (Kaley Cuoco) doseli u njihovo susjedstvo. I dok je Sheldon sretan sa svojim disfunkcionalnim prijateljima Wolowitzom (Simon Helberg) i Koothrappalijem (Kunal Nayyar), Leonard u Penny vidi šansu za romansom.
