programme.title: 24 orë në Londër
programme.desc: 2020. Një detektive e diskredituar, eprorët e së cilës vënë në pikëpyetje çdo lëvizjeje të saj, është e bindur se fshihet diçka më shumë se sa sugjerojnë provat, kur një vrasës i heshtur kryen vrasje gjatë 24-orëve.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: IO: E vetme në Tokë
programme.desc: Margaret Qualley, Anthony Mackie. Toka është bërë e pajetueshme. Njerëzimi është larguar, veç një shkencëtareje që beson se planeti mund të shpëtohet. Diçka ndryshon pasi ajo takon një burrë që nxiton drejt anijes së fundit që niset nga Toka...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Peshkaqeni i Liqenit
programme.desc: 2015. Dolph Lundgren. Sulmet e pabesueshme të një peshkaqeni në liqenin e një qyteze te vogël, trondisin policinë, të cilët thërrasin ndihmën e një ish të dënuari, tregtar kafshësh ekzotike, për të kapur kafshën.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: SWAT: 24 orë
programme.desc: Tom Sizemore, Mischa Barton. Skuadra e SWAT duhet te ndalojë një terrorist i cili kërcënon me vrasjen e pengjeve të pafajshëm dhe shkatërrimin e Los Anxhelosit. Ata kanë vetëm 24 orë kohë të ndalojnë sulmin dhe të vendosin drejtësi!
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: I vetmi
programme.desc: Jet Li, Carla Gugino, Delroy Lindo, Jason Statham. Jet Li në rolin e dyfishtë si një oficer policie në luftë për jetën e tij kundër një vrasësi sozi nga një univers tjetër.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në kërkim të helmit të përjetësise
programme.desc: Zbulimi rastësor i një mumjeje perandorake kineze nga një ekip shkencëtarësh, çliron një mallkim të tmerrshëm dymijë vjeçar, një sekret duhej të qëndronte i varrosur përgjithmonë.
programme.category: Aksion
horror

programme.title: Vullkani
programme.desc: Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche. Në botë ka mbi 1500 vullkane aktivë për të cilët jemi në dijeni dhe të paktën një, për të cilin nuk dime gjë. Pikërisht ky kërcënon të marrë jetë njerëzish e të shkatërrojë një qytet të tërë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Straton: Forcat speciale
programme.desc: Dominic Cooper, Austin Stowell. Pas vdekjes së kolegut të tij amerikan, një agjent i MI6-s dhe skuadra e tij bëjnë të pamundurën për të ndalur një terrorist që kërkon të përdorë armë kimike kundër popullsisë.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Marinsat 3: Rrethimi
programme.desc: Charlie Weber, Scott Adkins. Pasi një ambasadë amerikane sulmohet nga terroristët, shpresa e vetme për shpëtim është një grup i vogël marinsash.
programme.category: Action War

programme.title: Planeti i majmunëve: Revolucioni
programme.desc: Andy Serkis, Jason Clarke, Gary Oldman. Shoqëria e majmunëve, me ne krye Çezarin është shumuar, zhvilluar dhe jeton në paqe. Një grup njerëzish të mbijetuar, duke fajësuar majmunët, kërkojnë hakmarrje dhe paqja delikate rrezikon të thyhet.
programme.category: Aksion
drame

programme.title: Mythica: Kurora e hekurt
programme.desc: Melanie Stone, Adam Johnson. Një magjistare e re dhe guximtare, shtie në dorë pjesën e fundit ë Darksporit më të fuqishëm dhe bën gjithçka për ta mbajtur larg nga një magjistar djallëzor.
programme.category: Aksion
Fantazi

programme.title: Tokë e premtuar
programme.desc: Matt Damon. Përfaqësuesi i një kompanie gjigante, dërgohet në një qytezë në vërshtirësi ekonomike, per t'i ofruar banorëve ndihmë, në këmbim të nxjerrjes së naftës në pronat e tyre... Por shumë shpejt gjërat do të komplikohen...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Një fundjavë me babanë
programme.desc: Clive Owen, Maria Bello, Jaeden Martell. Kur një marangoz i divorcuar dhe me probleme me alkoolin ngarkohet të kalojë kohë me të birin 8-vjeçar, fundjava e qetë në shtëpi, kthehet në një aventurë që forcon lidhjen e veçantë babë e bir.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Mesia i Ri
programme.desc: Historia e Jezu Krishtit gjatë moshës 7-vjeçare, kur ai dhe familja e tij u shpërngulën nga Egjipti për në Nazaret. Parë nga këndvështrimi i fëmijërisë së tij, tregohet Jezusi i ri tek rritet drejt identitetit të tij fetar.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Drejtpërdrejt nga Bagdadi
programme.desc: M.Keaton, H.B. Carter, L.Taylor. Kandidat për 3 Globe të Arte. Lufta e Gjirit Persik, 1991. Janë përpjekjet e pareshtura të një grupi gazetarësh të kanalit televiziv CNN për të pasqyruar direkt luftën pa marrë parasysh rreziqet që sjell ajo.
programme.category: Bazuar në një histori të vërtetë

programme.title: Kur gjithçka ndryshon
programme.desc: Bette Midler, Colin Firth, Matthew Broderick. Helen Hunt vjen si regjisore në filmin bazuar në romanin Bestseller të Elinor Lipman. Një grua moderne përballë një krize moderne të moshës së mesme.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Armët e zemrës
programme.desc: Priscilla C. Shirer, T.C. Stallings, Karen Abercrombie. Një familje në dukje perfekte përpiqet të rregullojë problemet me ndihmën e një gruaje të vjetër në moshë...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Zonja e erëzave
programme.desc: Aishwarya Rai. Tilo është mjeshtre e erëzave dhe hap një dyqan në San Francisko. Ajo arrin të lexojë jetën dhe deshirat e klienteve të saj dhe u jep atyre erëza të ndryshme për t'i ndihmuar që të realizoje dëshirat e tyre.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ndeshja më e madhe e Muhamed Ali
programme.desc: Në vitin 1967, kampioni i boksit, Muhammed Ali refuzoi të luftonte në Vietnam, bazuar në bindjet e tij fetare. Çështja e tij do të shqyrtohet nga Gjykata e Lartë dhe përballja e tij më e madhe do të jetë me qeverinë amerikane.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Njerka
programme.desc: Julia Roberts, Susan Sarandon. Drama prekëse e dy grave, njëra nënë e dy fëmijëve dhe tjetra njerka e tyre. Një marrdhënie e trazuar, që ndryshon vetëm kur njëra prej tyre merr lajmin se është sëmurë rëndë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Kalëruesi i dallgëve
programme.desc: Gerard Butler, Jonny Weston. Historia e 15 vjeçarit Xhei Moriariti që kërkon ndihmën një serfisti legjendar për të kaluar dallgën më të famshme të oqeaneve, Maveriks...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Palo Alto
programme.desc: Emma Roberts, James Franco. Në mungesë të vëmendjes e kontrollit nga prindërit, disa adoleshentë nga qyteza e njohur Palo Alto në Kaliforni, rebelohen ndaj tyre duke përdorur drogë dhe duke përjetuar eksperienca të ndryshme seksuale.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Rregullat e Xhorxhas
programme.desc: Jane Fonda, Lindsay Lohan. Kur sheh se s'ia del dot me të bijën, adoleshente rebele, Lili vendos ta çojë në shtëpinë e nënës së saj, ku ishte betuar se s'do kthehej kurrë. Tri femra krejt te ndryshme, do jetojnë me rregullat e Xhorxhas.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Dallimet që na afrojnë
programme.desc: Greg Kinnear, Renée Zellweger, Djimon Hounsou. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë te një tregtuesi veprash arti, i cili detyrohet të miqësohet me një njeri të pastrehë, në dukje të rrezikshëm, vetëm për të shpëtuar martesën e tij...
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Nënë!
programme.desc: Një film nga Darren Aronofsky. Jennifer Lawrence, Javier Bardem, Ed Harris, Michelle Pfeiffer. Marrëdhënia e një çifti vihet në dilemë, kur vizitohen në shtëpi nga mysafirë të paftuar, që do të shkatërrojnë jetën e tyre të qetë.
programme.category: Horror psikologjik

programme.title: Misteri i Liqenit të Argjendt
programme.desc: Andrew Garfield. Një djalë e ri nis një hetim për zhdukjen e papritur të fqinjës, por gjatë përpjekjeve për të deshifruar sekretin e zhdukjes së saj, ngec në një komplot dredhues e të rrezikshëm.
programme.category: Komedi
mister

programme.title: Warcraft: Zanafilla
programme.desc: Një aventurë epike, bazuar në një nga videolojërat më të suksesshme! Ndërkohë që një ushtri orkësh sulmojnë mbretërinë e Azerotit, disa njerëz dhe orkë bashkojnë forcat për të mundur të keqen e madhe që fshihet pas luftës.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Bill djali
programme.desc: Ethan Hawke, Chris Pratt. Një 14-vjeçar lidh një alenacë të pazakontë me sherifin e zonës Pat Garret dhe me të jashtëligjshmin 'Billy the Kid', në një mision për të shpëtuar të motrën nga duart e xhaxhait të tyre të dhunshëm.
programme.category: Biografi
Uestern
Aksion

programme.title: Arrëthyesi dhe katër mbretërit
programme.desc: Keira Knightley, Mackenzie Foy, Helen Mirren, Morgan Freeman. Kur e ëma e ndjerë i lë Klarës një dhuratë misterioze, ajo nis një udhëtim drejt 4 mbretërive sekrete ku zbulon se zotëron fuqinë për të ndryshuar botën...
programme.category: Fantazi
aventurë

programme.title: Aksel
programme.desc: Aksel, një qen robot gati i pamposhtëm, i krijuar nga ushtira, zhduket pas një eksperimenti dhe zbulohet nga një adoleshent me të cilin lidh miqësi të fortë. Ata do të bëjnë gjithçka për njëri-tjetrin, edhe të dalin kundër atyre që e krijuan.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Mamma Mia 2
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Amanda Seyfried, Cher. Kanë kaluar 10 vjet nga ngjarjet e fundit në ishullin e magjishëm të Kalokairit. Sofia është shtatëzënë, dhe njësoj si e ëma në të shkuarën, edhe ajo do të duhet të rrezikojë pak në të tashmen.
programme.category: Muzikal / Komedi romantike

programme.title: Me sytë e çmendurisë
programme.desc: Katherine Heigl. Një adoleshente që vuan nga skizofrenia, lufton me halucinacione të frikshme. Kur ajo fillon të gjejë të dhëna se fqinja e saj ka rrëmbyer një fëmijë, i vetmi person që e beson, është miku i saj Kalebi.
programme.category: Thriller psikologjik
Horror
Dramë

programme.title: Erdhi cirku
programme.desc: Tre komedianët e njohur italianë, në skenë me një seri skeçesh, me batuta e role si; murgj, kirgurgë të paaftë, policë të forcave speciale, barabarë, magjistarë, aventurierë e parodi të disa filmave të njohur amerikanë...
programme.category: Aldo
Giovanni & Giacomo

programme.title: Muaj mjalti
programme.desc: Carlo Verdone, sjell një tjetër komedi mjaft zbavitëse në stilin e 'E bardhë, e kuqe dhe...Verdone'. Tre çifte të sapomartuarish, do të ndërmarrin tre muaj mjalti, ku aventurat dhe telashet nuk do të kenë të sosur...
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Faleminderit për gjithçka
programme.desc: W.Snipes, P.Swayze, J.Leguizamo. Një interpretim jashtë kornizave i 3 aktorëve tipike burrërore. 3 travestite bllokohen në një qytet të vogel, por me talentin dhe garderoben e tyre plot ngjyra ata do t'i japin jetë qytetit dhe banorëve të tij.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Përshëndetje nga unë, Doris
programme.desc: Sally Field, Max Greenfield, Tyne Daly. Me ndihmën e mikes më të mirë dhe mbesës, një grua 60 e ca vjeçare thur një plan për të bërë për vete një koleg shumë më të ri në moshë...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: S'e di si ia del
programme.desc: Sarah Jessica Parker, Pierce Brosnan. Një grua e martuar, nënë e dy fëmijëve dhe e suksesshme në karrierë, përpiqet të përballojë jetën e saj kaotike, ku çdo ditë është një sfidë, pa asnjë minutë të lirë...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Don Verdin
programme.desc: Sam Rockwell, Amy Ryan. I punësuar nga një predikues i një qyteze për të gjetur relike te shenjta, një arkeolog i vetëshpallur i artefakteve Biblike fillon të shtrembërojë fare pak të vërtetën...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Tiramisu
programme.desc: Një film nga Fabio De Luigi. Ndonjëherë, pikërisht ajo që nuk ju kishte shkuar kurrë ne mendje, mund të bëhet arsyeja që puna juaj të bëhet një sukses i padiskutueshëm. Me Vittoria Puccini, Fabio De Luigi.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Dasmë në Long Ajlënd
programme.desc: 2018. Adam Sandler, Chris Rock. Dy baballarë me karaktere të ndryshëm dhe pikëpamje krejt të kundërta për organizimin e dasmës së fëmijëve të tyre, pëpiqen të ruajnë gjakftohtësinë gjatë javës kaotike përpara ditës së madhe...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: S'ka më 2 pa ty
programme.desc: Fabio Troiano, Dino Abbrescia, Belen Rodriguez. Moreno dhe Alfonso, jetojnë të lumtur së bashku prej vitesh. Deri kur njëri prej tyre papritur, zbulon se i pëlqejnë femrat.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Mesnatë në Switchgrass
programme.desc: : Emile Hirsch, Megan Fox, Bruce Willis. Dy agjentë të FBI-së që ndodhen në Florida për një çështje rutinë, i bashkohen hetimit të një polici vendas, i cili me vendosmëri po përpiqet të kapë një vrasës serial që vret brutalisht vajza të reja.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Arsenali
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage, John Cusack. Lidhja mes dy vëllezëve që kanë marrë drejtime të kundërta në jetë, sprovohet kur një bos krimi merr peng njërin prej tyre dhe kërkon para nga vëllai tjetër, një biznesmen i suksesshëm që do të heqë dorë nga të gjitha parimet e.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Karamelet e djallit
programme.desc: Një piktor dhe familja e tij besojnë se kanë blerë shtëpinë e ëndrave të tyre, por kur ai pushtohet nga një forcë misterioze, ata duhet të luftojnë që të shpëtojnë shpirtrat e tyre.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Valhalla, luftetari i heshtur
programme.desc: Mads Mikkelsen Maarten Stevenson, Gary Lewis. Një skllav memec dhe me një sy, luftëtar i pashoq, arrin të arratiset nga padroni skocez dhe bashkë me një grup vikingësh fillojnë një udhëtim të rrezikshëm për të çliruar 'Tokën e Shenjtë'.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: I dashuri im është zombi
programme.desc: N.Hoult, T.Palmer. Një histori dashurie si asnjë tjetër. Pas një epidemie që ka kthyer shumicën e njerëzve në zombi, R një zombi aspak i zakontë, bie në dashuri me Xhulin një vajzë normale. Por a do mundet dashuria e tyre të lulëzojë?
programme.category: Horror
komedi

programme.title: Efekti Lazarus
programme.desc: 2015. Mark Duplass, Olivia Wilde. Disa studiues mjekësorë, arrijnë të prodhojnë një serum që mund të risjellë në jetë të vdekurit, por gjërat shkojnë tmerrësisht keq kur ata e përdorin serumin për të ringjallur një nga pjestarët e skuadrës...
programme.category: Horror
fantashkencë

programme.title: I dyshuari kryesor
programme.desc: Michael Chiklis, Forest Whitaker, Ray Liotta. Një polic gjendet rastësisht në një restorant, kur njerëz të armatosur futen per ta grabitur. Ndërtesa është rrethuar dhe situata do të marrë një kthesë që askush nuk mund ta parashikojë...
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Tradhti fatale
programme.desc: Gina Carano, Ewan McGregor, Michael Fassbender. E tradhtuar nga dikush brenda agjencisë, një nga agjentet më të mira të C.I.A-s, fillon një mision të rrrezikshëm për të zbuluar të vërtetën...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Shenja e pilivesës
programme.desc: K.Costner, S.Thompson. E shoqja e Xho Derrou vdiq gjatë një misioni të kryqit të kuq. Edhe pse ateist, ai fillon të besojë se ajo kërkon të komunikojë me të përmes pacienteve të tij në shtratin e vdekjes, për t'i thënë diçka të rëndësishme.
programme.category: Fantazi
mister

programme.title: Lufta e togerit Hart
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Colin Farrell. Në një kamp përqëndrimi gjerman, një oficer dhe një toger i ri, robër të luftës, thurin një plan të rrezikshëm që mund t'u kushtojë gjithçka.
programme.category: Luftë

programme.title: Dom Heminguej
programme.desc: Jude Law, Richard E. Grant. Pas 12 vitesh të kaluar në burg për shkak se nuk spiunoi shokët, hapësi i famshëm i kasafortave, Dom Heminguej, rikthehet në rrugët e Londrës përtë marrë shpërblimin që i takon.
programme.category: Krim
komedi

programme.title: Evil Dead
Zla smrt
programme.desc:
Evil Dead: Directed by Fede Alvarez. With Jane Levy, Shiloh Fernandez, Lou Taylor Pucci, Jessica Lucas. Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1288558/","name":"Evil Dead","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzk2ZTVhOWMtMWQxYS00OWQzLWFmY2QtODQ4NGFmNGQxZWVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1288558/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"N-Weiss90"},"dateCreated":"2013-04-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent re-imagining of a classic","reviewBody":"I have to say I'm very surprised at all the negative reviews I've been reading. I'm an avid movie lover, frequenting the theaters at least twice a week if not more. Something about being able to just sit back in a dark room, with a big screen and great sound. It's just good fun. Movies are enjoyable, not all are realistic and I think that's the point. If I wanted something realistic, I would watch a documentary (which I do on many occasions).

I think a lot of the reviews are being very unfair to this movie. I have seen the original and I loved it. Especially when I first saw it as a kid, it scared the crap out of me. But we have to remember that we are in a new age with different technologies and expectations. I bet that if the original was released for the first time right now, it would have been shot down even more than this "remake." Although I love the original, the effects don't scare me like they used to. And people who complain about the acting and script of the new movie? Come on. It wasn't perfect, but it's nowhere near as bad as others are making it out to be. And Jane Levy was absolutely AMAZING in this film. I would watch this movie over and over again just to see her act.

People are judging this movie too harshly. Was this movie enjoyable? Yes. Very much so. Were the effects good? The effects were A+ and the score was magnificent. Would I see it again? Yes. I would go see it again at the movies AND buy it as soon as it's available on Blu Ray.

This movie is not meant to be a remake of the first, rather a reawakening of an old and classic evil. Watch this movie with an open mind and you will love it. Watch it and compare it to the original? You will hate it, because they are not the same movies. Both were brilliant, but I would be lying if I didn't say that I enjoyed this version a lot more than the old one. Acting by Levy was perfect, gore was fantastic, scares were good, and the movie had my attention all the way through.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":164368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2013-04-17","keywords":"demon,forest,zombie,fear,nurse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2732631577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjY4NDkzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODExODMzOQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjY4NDkzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODExODMzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3994408/","name":"Jane Levy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2057036/","name":"Shiloh Fernandez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140300/","name":"Jessica Lucas"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1793079/","name":"Fede Alvarez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314851/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116611/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1793079/","name":"Fede Alvarez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2140186/","name":"Rodo Sayagues"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000600/","name":"Sam Raimi"}],"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

I'm an avid movie lover, frequenting the theaters at least twice a week if not more. Something about being able to just sit back in a dark room, with a big screen and great sound. It's just good fun. Movies are enjoyable, not all are realistic and I think that's the point. If I wanted something realistic, I would watch a documentary (which I do on many occasions).

I think a lot of the reviews are being very unfair to this movie. I have seen the original and I loved it. Especially when I first saw it as a kid, it scared the crap out of me. But we have to remember that we are in a new age with different technologies and expectations. I bet that if the original was released for the first time right now, it would have been shot down even more than this "remake." Although I love the original, the effects don't scare me like they used to. And people who complain about the acting and script of the new movie? Come on. It wasn't perfect, but it's nowhere near as bad as others are making it out to be. And Jane Levy was absolutely AMAZING in this film. I would watch this movie over and over again just to see her act.

People are judging this movie too harshly. Was this movie enjoyable? Yes. Very much so. Were the effects good? The effects were A+ and the score was magnificent. Would I see it again? Yes. I would go see it again at the movies AND buy it as soon as it's available on Blu Ray.

This movie is not meant to be a remake of the first, rather a reawakening of an old and classic evil. Watch this movie with an open mind and you will love it. Watch it and compare it to the original? You will hate it, because they are not the same movies. Both were brilliant, but I would be lying if I didn't say that I enjoyed this version a lot more than the old one. Acting by Levy was perfect, gore was fantastic, scares were good, and the movie had my attention all the way through.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":164368,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror"],"datePublished":"2013-04-17","keywords":"demon,forest,zombie,fear,nurse","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2732631577","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjY4NDkzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODExODMzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIzMjY4NDkzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODExODMzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival. programme.title: The Witches
Vještice Roalda Dahla
programme.desc:
The Witches: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Chris Rock, Jahzir Bruno, Octavia Spencer, Brian Bovell. A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805647/","name":"The Witches","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYjlhMjEtYzIwOC00ZWYzLTgyMmQtYjI5M2UzNDJkNTU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805647/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please make these awful remakes stop.","reviewBody":"Oh Dear,

This should have been good, it needed to be good, sadly it just isn't. It's one of those films where a remake didn't seem to be necessary, but as someone that loved Roald Dahl as a child my interest was peaked.

It's inconsistent throughout, did they perhaps rush it because of Covid? The special effects look decent in parts, and woeful in others, Anne Hathaway displays personality it's fair to say, but her accent..... If anyone remembers Rentaghost, think Miss Popov, she spans countries from Ireland to Russia, it had me chuckling.

Once again, please, please try and give us something new and original, stop taking things that have already been made, and making them ten times worse. An extra point for casting the wonderful Josette Simon.

It made me want to watch Anjelica Huston.

I paid to download it, that money could have gone on something less awful, like a Donny Osmond cd.

Naff, 3/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"based on novel,witch,european literature on screen,taking off shoes,barefoot female","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1302249753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In late 1967, a young orphaned boy (Bruno) goes to live with his Grandma (Spencer) in the rural Alabama town of Demopolis. As the boy and his grandmother encounter some deceptively glamorous but thoroughly diabolical witches, she wisely whisks our young hero away to an opulent seaside resort. Regrettably, they arrive at precisely the same time that the world's Grand High Witch (Hathaway) has gathered her fellow cronies from around the globe to carry out her nefarious plans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0818055/","name":"Octavia Spencer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001804/","name":"Stanley Tucci"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1244069/","name":"Kenya Barris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Druga strana svega
Druga strana svega
programme.desc: Druga strana svega: Directed by Mila Turajlic. With Srbijanka Turajlic, Mila Turajlic, Mira Boskic, Mladen Kostic. For Serbian filmmaker Mila Turajlic, a locked door in her mother's apartment in Belgrade provides the gateway to both her remarkable family history and her country's tumultuous political inheritance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7218812/","name":"Druga strana svega","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTFjYzRlZmEtNWNmYS00NzRlLThhNWMtNDhlM2U0ZjdlMmQ5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE4MTM5OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"For Serbian filmmaker Mila Turajlic, a locked door in her mother's apartment in Belgrade provides the gateway to both her remarkable family history and her country's tumultuous political inheritance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7218812/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Stories behind war","reviewBody":"War is never something ... at least for me it is something that I do not fully understand. But what does it do with individuals that are really affected by it? You have things to look back to, family members that are lost, things left behind, be it in locked rooms or in your head.\n\nA not really easy watch, but well handled look at the balkan war (I think that is what it's called) - a personalized look into it, with quite the flavor. If you like documentaries about interesting people and their stories, this one is for you. Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Godzilla vs. Kong: Directed by Adam Wingard. With Alexander Skarsgård, Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall, Brian Tyree Henry. The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5034838/","name":"Godzilla vs. Kong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmYzMzU4NjctNDI0Mi00MGExLWI3ZDQtYzQzYThmYzc2ZmNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEyMjM2NDc2._V1_.jpg","description":"The epic next chapter in the cinematic Monsterverse pits two of the greatest icons in motion picture history against one another - the fearsome Godzilla and the mighty Kong - with humanity caught in the balance.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5034838/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kenzibit"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Epic battles with an uninspired plot.","reviewBody":"Rating basically for the epic battles in this movie, great special effects that blend perfectly with the environment accompanied by immersive sounds to rumble your speakers. Kudos to all those responsible for that. On the other hand, this movie does a poor job of character personalization and story plot. Had a lot of fake smiles and poor dialogues, did a poor job of making you feel for any character's situation and wanting more from them, it's like the movie pauses when scenes switch from the Kaijus to humans. Characters were introduced for no particular purpose or reason. Story was dull and uninspiring. Wouldn't recommend this movie for the plot or character performances but will recommend it for the epic Kaiju battles and CGI.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":180433,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"E","genre":["Action","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2021-03-25","keywords":"monster versus monster,kaiju,godzilla character,king kong character,monsterverse","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi576962841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVjMmY4ODUtMmYzMC00NDdjLWE4MjMtOWUzMDBlNzczOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWVjMmY4ODUtMmYzMC00NDdjLWE4MjMtOWUzMDBlNzczOGMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"From Warner Bros. programme.title: Wo hu cang long
Tigar i zmaj
programme.desc:
Wo hu cang long: Directed by Ang Lee. With Chow Yun-Fat, Michelle Yeoh, Ziyi Zhang, Chang Chen. A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0190332/","name":"Wo hu cang long","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDdhMzMxOTctNDMyNS00NTZmLTljNWEtNTc4MDBmZTYxY2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0190332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Larry-17"},"dateCreated":"2001-01-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Magical Romance...","reviewBody":"There's a telling moment near the beginning of Ang Lee's "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon."

In closeup, we see the rough-hewn, heavy wooden wheels of a peasant cart. They nestle in deep ruts worn into the stone paving blocks of a roadway entering a gated city. The cart rumbles on, its wheels fitting perfectly into the grooves worn by unspoken centuries of just such passing wagons...in one image we see how tradition creates its own paths, how contemporary reality is fabricated to fit such traditions... The camera rises, we see an almost impossible panorama of Peking, the Forbidden City spreading out before us like an Oz extending to the horizon.

What a film this is: a superb action adventure romance with terrific acting and a much-welcome heart underlying the technical superiority.

"Crouching Tiger...", I am told, is representative of a specific literary/cinematic genre in China: Wu Xia...the wizard/warrior piece...magic and martial arts blended. I'm not familiar with the form, but the world portrayed here is a breathtakingly fantastical one. The story is putatively set in 19th century China, but it could be anywhere, anywhen. It is a place of high honor and deep feelings, a place where people are bound by traditions and held captive by their forms. It is also a place of wild and mythic landscapes...from stark desert (thought nowhere do we get that featureless, wide-screen linear horizon seen in David Lean's "Lawrence of Arabia!") to magic misty green mountains with deep dark lakes and steeply cascading streams that come braiding, tumbling down the rockslide heights. High, reedy bamboo forests wave, wondrous, in sighing winds.

In this world people may do amazing things. The flying in this movie -- properly called "wire work" in film terms -- is fantastic. This technique, of course, was not invented by the Wachowski's, but the choreographer of "Crouching Tiger...", Woo-ping Yuen, also staged the wire-fights of "Matrix." Here, the ability of our warrior heros and villains to climb walls, to leap to the rooftops and soar from building to building -- not to mention engaging each other in aerial combat that soars from the peak of a mountain top to the rocks of a mountain stream in a single take -- or to duel on the very tips of dipping, waving bamboo trees -- looks almost plausible, just over the border of the possible, at least. The whole packed-in audience at the big theater at the advanced screening at Pipers Alley in Chicago burst into spontaneous applause several times throughout...

At other moments, I found myself in weepy transport. As I think of the fight in the treetops, right now, I become drippy -- tingly of eye and sinus.

Apart from all else, this is grand storytelling! It has passion, love, revenge...it expresses deep need and longing.

And, yes, the woman are the action hearts of the film! Michelle Yeoh is wonderful...but I've been in love with her for years. Here, she is more mature, quieter, wiser than in any role I've seen her in. Her performance is strong and moving, her face registering, magically, a range of conflicting emotions, hidden secrets, crouching angers, all at once. In acting training we were always told you can't do that. She does it.

Chow Yun Fat, too...I've been a fan of his since I first discovered John Woo's Hong Kong crime thrillers...is the best I've ever seen, as well...magnificent in his silences. Strength without cruelty.

The center of the film is a girl who looks to be about 15! Ziyi Zhang whose date of birth is given as 1979. Zhang is from Beijing, China, and has only one other film credit. She is remarkable. Her story is the film's binding element. And this newcomer holds it together! Holding her own with Yeoh and Chow in both dramatic material and in the balletic martial pas des dieux's that frame the conflicts between characters. She is the "Luke Skywalker" of the piece, if you will...though "Crouching Tiger..." has everything the "Star Wars" saga aspires to: excitement, thrills and magic. Here however, technical fireworks are wrapped heart and deeply resonant spirit. Elements Lukasfilm wanted to have, but which it succeeded in providing only in the most self-conscious way.

By the way: this is an action film, almost uniquely without violence...or, rather, the violence is so stylized, so removed into some mystical realm, that it almost disappears into dance. There is, I believe, only one small splash of blood on-screen. Typically, I don't like that -- figuring that if you're going to do a film where violence is part of it all, where action advances plot, let's have it full-bore, the "Full Peckinpaw," if you will. Here, however, this stylization works beautifully with action sequences that take the breath away and inspire a sense of awe, rather than simply leave you white-knuckled and sweaty.

There are those who will grumble that Jackie Chan (another favorite of mine) does it all for real, without wires and tricks. True enough... But here that exuberance of motion is in service of a grand story and strong characters who carry worthwhile emotional burdens!

I won't be able to wait for the DVD, and will probably see it again, perhaps see it twice before it hits the home-market.

My recommendation: Just go see it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":261834,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-03-21","keywords":"china,female martial artist,defying gravity,tragic hero,mixed martial arts","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1046455321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDY1ZjQ4YzAtODZmNy00M2JhLTkwNzItNjA0NDFmZDM2MzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000334/","name":"Chow Yun-Fat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000706/","name":"Michelle Yeoh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0955471/","name":"Ziyi Zhang"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000487/","name":"Ang Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0078389/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041248/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910924/","name":"Hui-Ling Wang"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0770005/","name":"James Schamus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0874631/","name":"Kuo Jung Tsai"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Axios
programme.desc: Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. Dobitnik Emmyja Matthew O'Neill i Perri Peltz režiraju i produciraju limitiranu dokumentarnu seriju s vijestima, orijentiranim specijalima nove medijske tvrtke Axios. O'Neilll i Peltz rade s vodećim Axiosovim novinarima kako bi stavili naglasak na politiku, biznis i tehnologiju sljedećeg tjedna - kao i velike teme koje oblikuju budućnost. Svako izdanje AXIOS-a pokriva aktualni veliki problem iza kojeg slijede kratki dokumentarci, poučni intervjui s važnim osobama te pouzdani uvidi preneseni AXIOS-ovom tipičnom "inteligentnom jezgrovitošću" u sažetom, djeljivom formatu.

programme.title: Ammonite
Amonit
programme.desc: Ammonite: Directed by Francis Lee. With Sarah White, Liam Thomas, Sam Parks, Kate Winslet. 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7983894/","name":"Ammonite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmM3ZGZlMWUtMjY1OS00NjBkLWE4MjQtODJkMmQ1MzdjYzhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7983894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reyesrh"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Silence Art","reviewBody":"I just wanna point out that the scenes with no dialogue are the one's that say a lot ... Kate Winslet masters the way she talks only with her eyes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13798,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2020-11-13","keywords":"lesbian romance,female scientist,period drama,based on real person,lesbianism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4176724249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2FkZjMzY2MtOTY4Zi00ODg3LTk5MDEtZDg1YmE2NzQ3OTVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the 1840s, acclaimed self-taught palaeontologist Mary Anning works alone on the wild and brutal Southern English coastline of Lyme Regis. The days of her famed discoveries behind her, she now hunts for common fossils to sell to rich tourists to support herself and her ailing widowed mother. When one such tourist, Roderick Murchison, arrives in Lyme on the first leg of a European tour, he entrusts Mary with the care of his young wife Charlotte, who is recuperating from a personal tragedy. Mary, whose life is a daily struggle on the poverty line, cannot afford to turn him down but, proud and relentlessly passionate about her work, she clashes with her unwanted guest. They are two women from utterly different worlds. Yet despite the chasm between their social spheres and personalities, Mary and Charlotte discover they can each offer what the other has been searching for: the realisation that they are not alone. It is the beginning of a passionate and all-consuming love affair that will defy all social bounds and alter the course of both lives irrevocably."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000701/","name":"Kate Winslet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519680/","name":"Saoirse Ronan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428121/","name":"Gemma Jones"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0605911/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0497274/","name":"Francis Lee"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Ratatouille: Directed by Brad Bird, Jan Pinkava. With Patton Oswalt, Ian Holm, Lou Romano, Brian Dennehy. A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0382932/","name":"Ratatouille","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTkxMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjQ4MzMzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382932/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"superfan18"},"dateCreated":"2007-06-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent movie!","reviewBody":"Tonight I went to see Ratatouille during a preview offered to Myspace users in Boston. Overall the movie was GREAT! It was really funny, often in unexpected places, the storyline kept you engaged the entire time and the overall mood was lighthearted and inspiring. A real "feel-good" movie. I admit I was a bit skeptical going in, I mean the idea of a rat in a kitchen kind of left me queasy, but I left the theater excited to see it again when it is released. The voice actors are excellent and the animation is amazing. I've been to Paris before and the overall views were very accurate. At times I could tell exactly where in the city the events were taking place. Overall a fabulous movie, I highly recommend it!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":675619,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-08-22","keywords":"rat,chef,ratatouille,cooking,paris france","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ratatouille","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi906147865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjU0YmUzZTQtZDU4ZS00NWYxLWJlNDMtOWE0ZWIzOGJmODM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"CT #2, Post"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004951/","name":"Brad Garrett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0738918/","name":"Lou Romano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0652663/","name":"Patton Oswalt"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083348/","name":"Brad Bird"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0684342/","name":"Jan Pinkava"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0135296/","name":"Jim Capobianco"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Pride & Prejudice
Ponos i predrasude
programme.desc:
Pride & Prejudice: Directed by Joe Wright. With Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone. Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414387/","name":"Pride & Prejudice","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA1NDQ3NTcyOTNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDA0MzA4MzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414387/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Three weddings and no funeral","reviewBody":"This quintessentially English film is utterly charming - a very traditional interpretation of Jane Austen's 1813 novel that manages to entertain, amuse and even move. First time director Joe Wright has worked with television playwright Deborah Moggach's script and a wonderful collection of mainly British actors to delight us. The versatile camera-work, luscious countryside, grand settings, period costumes, and atmospheric music are evidence of a work on which much love has been lavished.

At the heart of this triumph is the delightful 20 year old Keira Knightley as the assured and sharp Elizabeth Bennett, the second of five daughters looking to be married off by an anxious mother. Knightley's rise in the thespian firmament has been meteoric and this is her best performance to date in a role for which she is perfectly cast. Matthew MacFadyen is suitably brooding and gauche as Mr Darcy, but the cast list is enlivened with splendid British character actors, including Brenda Blethyn as Lizzie's irascible mother, Tom Hollander as a diminutive cleric seeking a wife, and Judi Dench as the formidable Lady Catherine, plus the Canadian Donald Sutherland (Lizzie's wise father).

This is a Georgian world in which social conventions present a veritable minefield for indiscretions or misunderstandings and in which a formal dance can be as intricate an occasion as international diplomacy. Pride and prejudice are only two of the obstacles to be overcome before inevitably true love brings Lizzie and her dark knight nose to nose (we don't even see a kiss). Passionate stuff indeed."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":275936,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-10","keywords":"pride and prejudice,england,gentleman,bachelor,prejudice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Pride & Prejudice","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3045130521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjAwOTY1MDktM2IxMy00MTA4LWI4NjEtNWM1ZjNmMWJmMzkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Focus Features"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0461136/","name":"Keira Knightley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000950/","name":"Brenda Blethyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0942504/","name":"Joe Wright"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042399/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0595738/","name":"Deborah Moggach"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000807/","name":"Jane Austen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"}],"duration":"PT2H9M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
Kong: Otok lobanja
programme.desc:
Kong: Skull Island: Directed by Jordan Vogt-Roberts. With Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L. Jackson, Brie Larson, John C. Reilly. After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3731562/","name":"Kong: Skull Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDg0OGM1NWEtNDEwOC00OTE2LTliZWEtNzg1MTZkNjFlMmNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA4NjE0NjEy._V1_.jpg","description":"After the Vietnam war, a team of scientists explores an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3731562/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Her-Excellency"},"dateCreated":"2017-04-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Completely Entertaining Throughout","reviewBody":"THIS is the way a movie should be done.

Have you ever watched the scene from The Princess Bride where the grandfather tells the kid: It's got everything. "Fencing, fighting, torture, revenge, giants, monsters, chases, escapes, true love ...". Well, in a way, that's this version of KONG, and I am really happy and surprised at just how GOOD it was.

Take a bit of the original Kong, mix it with one part Private Ryan, a dash of The Deer Hunter, some Monty Python, lots of Jurassic Park, a pinch of A Space Oddity and mix well with some (insert your favorite lower-key funny movies HERE). The result is a pleasing fare one can really sink their teeth into and enjoy.

It has some familiar faces too, and what's best about it, is that not only do they live up to their so-called stardom, but even the unfamiliar or not-yet- "famous" actors with smaller roles, really do a great job and sell it. At no time while you are watching this movie do you feel it far-fetched or unbelievable that Kong actually exists, and isn't that, in a nutshell, what all movies should aspire to - the suspension of disbelief? Mission accomplished on this one, and good job to the creators.

A definite must-watch.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":301537,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2017-03-08","keywords":"giant spider,monster movie,giant monster,monster versus monster,pointless self sacrifice","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"4K Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2174206745","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM5ZWRmOGItNDYwZS00NTY1LTg5YzMtYmRhN2M5Y2I2MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDM5ZWRmOGItNDYwZS00NTY1LTg5YzMtYmRhN2M5Y2I2MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFuaW5vc2M@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1089991/","name":"Tom Hiddleston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. programme.title: Argo
Argo
programme.desc:
Argo: Directed by Ben Affleck. With Ben Affleck, Bryan Cranston, Alan Arkin, John Goodman. Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1024648/","name":"Argo","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzljNjY3MDYtYzc0Ni00YjU0LWIyNDUtNTE0ZDRiMGExMjZlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"Acting under the cover of a Hollywood producer scouting a location for a science fiction film, a CIA agent launches a dangerous operation to rescue six Americans in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran in 1979.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1024648/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cheche1"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good movie but took a lot of liberties","reviewBody":"This is a great movie. The story, acting, pacing, editing, etc. was just fantastic. Affleck's directing was solid, and the suspense will keep you entertained right through to the last seconds. I loved it. 

It did have one irritating thing, though, kind of a big one. It pointed most of the accolades to Affleck's character and the CIA. This really was not true. It was Ken Taylor and the Canadians who really pulled 'the Canadian Caper' off so successfully.

"When Taylor heard a few years ago that Mendez had sold movie rights to his book (which, to be fair, is much more generous than the movie about Canada's role), "I said, 'Well, that's going to be interesting.'...."The movie's fun, it's thrilling, it's pertinent, it's timely," he said. "But look, Canada was not merely standing around watching events take place. The CIA was a junior partner."

"The old postscript sent the message that, for political reasons, Canada took the credit. A sarcastic kicker noted that Taylor received 112 citations. The clear implication was that he did not deserve them."(Sept/Oct., 2012, thestar.com)".

So the USA does another revision on history here. I believe 'Argo' goes this far. Yes, it's based on a true story - the movie does it's best to allude that it sticks to technical accuracy. And it really does, in some ways. Historical pictures of flag burners, rioters, gate climbers, etc.. up against Argo film stills run by during the credits make it seem that the facts were adhered to down to the tiniest detail. In reality, it wasn't Tony Mendez or the CIA who were responsible for the success of this operation; actually they were barely there. 

Since the movie premiered, Ben Affleck has added emphasis on the movie postscripts since then that gives kudos to the Canadians' role. This was after Ken Taylor politely complained, as a Canadian would tactfully do. But Affleck did this only after pressure from Taylor himself.

I can understand the need to spice up events to make them as exciting and entertaining as possible, don't get me wrong. But this film needs to let the audience know that more explicitly than it does, even after the changed postscripts.

Still, a really entertaining and riveting film, very well done, and easily worth seeing. As a matter of fact, don't miss it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":593452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2012-11-21","keywords":"iran,hostage,u.s. embassy,escape,american embassy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Picture","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1537319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxODY4NDUyM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDk1Nzg3Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Iranian revolution reaches a boiling point, a CIA 'exfiltration' specialist concocts a risky plan to free six Americans who have found shelter at the home of the Canadian ambassador. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0186505/","name":"Bryan Cranston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000422/","name":"John Goodman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000255/","name":"Ben Affleck"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209646/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0184096/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006516/","name":"Chris Terrio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5410196/","name":"Tony Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2646452/","name":"Joshuah Bearman"}],"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The VVitch: A New-England Folktale
Vještica
programme.desc:
The VVitch: A New-England Folktale: Directed by Robert Eggers. With Anya Taylor-Joy, Ralph Ineson, Kate Dickie, Harvey Scrimshaw. A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4263482/","name":"The VVitch: A New-England Folktale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzkwMzAxOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc1OTk1NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4263482/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"avdropm-944-921852"},"dateCreated":"2016-03-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Summary:","reviewBody":"This is a story set in the early colonial period of New England. It has the authenticity of a well-researched historical drama, up to and including dialogue delivered in a period accent and vocabulary (softened a bit so that it's easy to understand). Instead of drawing on historical events, though, it draws on historical folklore -- it's the story of witchcraft afflicting a family, such as might have been told at the time.

The characters are a very believable, ordinary family, with the sorts of tensions and problems you'd expect from people living a hard and substantially isolated life after being exiled from the local colonial town. They also have period Calvinist attitudes, and the storytelling doesn't present an outsider's view of this or offer a modern commentary, but instead it just displays these attitudes and tells a story from the characters' standpoint.

Their reliance on period folklore means that it doesn't strictly follow modern horror movie tropes, either. It has the slow build of a modern psychological horror/thriller as well as the standard formula where tragedies start from tragic flaws, but the traditions it's drawing on depend on a Calvinist's conception of flaws, and treat witchcraft as a horrible, well-understood occurrence rather than a shocking supernatural surprise. This story applies these perspectives.

It's very well done in terms of writing, acting, and other aspects of execution, so it might have cross-over appeal to fans of horror, folklore, or straight period drama from colonial America.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":228755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-02-19","keywords":"witch,goat,black magic,isolation,new england","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer Commentary: Robert Eggers, Director of 'The Witch'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1994241305","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Director Robert Eggers gives IMDb exclusive commentary about the trailer for his latest film, 'The Witch.'"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0408591/","name":"Ralph Ineson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225483/","name":"Kate Dickie"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226159/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770908/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0356803/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

It has the authenticity of a well-researched historical drama, up to and including dialogue delivered in a period accent and vocabulary (softened a bit so that it's easy to understand). Instead of drawing on historical events, though, it draws on historical folklore -- it's the story of witchcraft afflicting a family, such as might have been told at the time.

The characters are a very believable, ordinary family, with the sorts of tensions and problems you'd expect from people living a hard and substantially isolated life after being exiled from the local colonial town. They also have period Calvinist attitudes, and the storytelling doesn't present an outsider's view of this or offer a modern commentary, but instead it just displays these attitudes and tells a story from the characters' standpoint.

Their reliance on period folklore means that it doesn't strictly follow modern horror movie tropes, either. It has the slow build of a modern psychological horror/thriller as well as the standard formula where tragedies start from tragic flaws, but the traditions it's drawing on depend on a Calvinist's conception of flaws, and treat witchcraft as a horrible, well-understood occurrence rather than a shocking supernatural surprise. This story applies these perspectives.

It's very well done in terms of writing, acting, and other aspects of execution, so it might have cross-over appeal to fans of horror, folklore, or straight period drama from colonial America.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":228755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2016-02-19","keywords":"witch,goat,black magic,isolation,new england","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer Commentary: Robert Eggers, Director of 'The Witch'","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1994241305","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzc2OTQ2NTcxOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk5OTIwODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Director Robert Eggers gives IMDb exclusive commentary about the trailer for his latest film, 'The Witch.'","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5896355/","name":"Anya Taylor-Joy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0408591/","name":"Ralph Ineson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225483/","name":"Kate Dickie"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226159/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770908/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0356803/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3211470/","name":"Robert Eggers"],"duration":"PT1H32M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc:
Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Walter_Probinsky"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Watch the 3+ Hour Director's Cut, not the Studio's 2+ Hour Butchered Cut","reviewBody":"There are two versions of this movie that are strikingly different in their impact and emotional meaning. The theatrical release is a 2-plus hour-long studio edit. The director's cut is 3-plus hour-long edit that was released later. I watched both versions back-to-back, and without question, the director's cut is the superior. It's not just a matter of additional footage putting more meat on the bone--more heart is added to the film as well.

The movie is a violent and gritty portrayal of the Crusades era in medieval times, but wrestles artfully with complex issues of faith, morality, justice and diversity and what it means to live a godly life. Apparently, the studio decided such thematic depth was a drawback and that audiences are mostly superficial morons, so they insisted on an edit that presented it as an action movie, leaving in just enough character development to feebly sew the action scenes together. In the process, not only character motivation was lost, but important plot developments in the story.

After watching the shorter edit first--which seemed disjointed and filled with holes in the way of crappy edits--I had to go look up the movie's synopsis online to understand what the hell I had watched. In the director's cut, it was much clearer. But the biggest difference is the thought-provoking character development and dialogue scenes throughout that bring an intelligence to the primitive times being depicted.

At the end of the studio edit, I felt uninspired and filled with a sense that the movie had many missed opportunities.

At the end of the director's cut, I felt I had seen a real movie with real ideas. And I was left thinking about it.

Ridley Scott has had some bad luck with studio interference in his edits, most memorably with the two versions of "Blade Runner." You would think they'd trust his instincts after all this time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":277079,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

G00D1","reviewBody":"The movie is different from usual horror/mystery films - not involving much gore/torture still maintains very good story-line and puzzle

1st half of the movie is originating puzzles, complicating the story; while the other half is filling in the gaps to solve that puzzles in a very unique way of back-patching/filling parallel events

Also, the sound-effects are very unique and different from usual, heard a bit new things

And, Yes, Passively marketing a few new terminologies and Singers/Songs :)

Overall very decent movie to spend good time and deserves to be in Horror/Mystery Category"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":43793,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Horror"],"datePublished":"2019-12-10","keywords":"phrogging,kidnapping,infidelity,murder,home invasion","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2866921241","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2NmY5MmMtNTgxMC00OWFhLTk1NGMtNzk4M2EwZDQxNTg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE2NmY5MmMtNTgxMC00OWFhLTk1NGMtNzk4M2EwZDQxNTg1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0855103/","name":"Jon Tenney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4977122/","name":"Owen Teague"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1726691/","name":"Adam Randall"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121295/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0493361/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0362154/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1984458/","name":"Devon Graye"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Beach
Žal
programme.desc:
The Beach: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Leonardo DiCaprio, Tilda Swinton, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon. On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163978/","name":"The Beach","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZTUzYWUtOTI4YS00NmZlLWE5MmQtZjFlZDZhNjg4MjQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163978/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unfairly Panned; A Good Movie","reviewBody":"Here is another of those films that got panned by critics all over the place, but I liked the movie and thought it was unfairly criticized.

Two things are not up for debate: the film is entertaining and the cinematography is gorgeous.

Leonardo DiCaprio's lead character is not particularly likable, but that's nothing new for him. He's good at playing the boyish, cocky immature type. He's also good at narration, which he provides here, as he has in a number of other films. In fact, I wish there were more of it in here.

French actress Virginie Ledoyen is a new face to me, and a pretty one. I found her intriguing, and not just because of her face Actually, all the characters were pretty darn interesting in this film and you get a varied group.

The scenery from Thailand is magnificent. By the way, "the beach" that's in this film really exists, just as it's seen here. The story is interesting, too, for the full two hours. My only complaint was that they might have toned down the language, particularly with all the f-words.

Don't listen to those national critics who blasted this. I think you'll be entertained.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":231488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2000-02-11","keywords":"thailand,paradise,travel,beach,island","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Beach","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3699966233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ0NmY3NjYtZmY0OC00OWI2LThhMDktMjlmZGE4OWZjNjMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ0NmY3NjYtZmY0OC00OWI2LThhMDktMjlmZGE4OWZjNjMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0948679/","name":"Daniel York"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0163978, Title: The Beach, --- Description: The Beach: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Leonardo DiCaprio, Tilda Swinton, Daniel York, Patcharawan Patarakijjanon. On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0163978/","name":"The Beach","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTljZTUzYWUtOTI4YS00NmZlLWE5MmQtZjFlZDZhNjg4MjQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc1NTQxODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"On vacation in Thailand, Richard sets out for an island rumored to be a solitary beach paradise.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0163978/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2006-10-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Unfairly Panned; A Good Movie","reviewBody":"Here is another of those films that got panned by critics all over the place, but I liked the movie and thought it was unfairly criticized.

Two things are not up for debate: the film is entertaining and the cinematography is gorgeous.

Leonardo DiCaprio's lead character is not particularly likable, but that's nothing new for him. He's good at playing the boyish, cocky immature type. He's also good at narration, which he provides here, as he has in a number of other films. In fact, I wish there were more of it in here.

French actress Virginie Ledoyen is a new face to me, and a pretty one. I found her intriguing, and not just because of her face Actually, all the characters were pretty darn interesting in this film and you get a varied group.

The scenery from Thailand is magnificent. By the way, "the beach" that's in this film really exists, just as it's seen here. The story is interesting, too, for the full two hours. My only complaint was that they might have toned down the language, particularly with all the f-words.

Don't listen to those national critics who blasted this. I think you'll be entertained.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":231488,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2000-02-11","keywords":"thailand,paradise,travel,beach,island","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Beach","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3699966233","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ0NmY3NjYtZmY0OC00OWI2LThhMDktMjlmZGE4OWZjNjMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTQ0NmY3NjYtZmY0OC00OWI2LThhMDktMjlmZGE4OWZjNjMwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000138/","name":"Leonardo DiCaprio","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0948679/","name":"Daniel York"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307497/","name":"Alex Garland"],"duration":"PT1H59M"</script><metacontent="
